analyzed: ngag ni rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir ngag thams cad nges par gzung ba dang bcas pa'i zhes pas rab rib kho na @30b la yod pa zhes nges par gzung ba dang bcas pa'i ngag gi don la de phan du 'gyur ro //
translated: Since speech has the effect of exclusion, all speech is accompanied by the expression of determination. Therefore, the meaning of the speech “only cataracts” is accompanied by the expression of determination.

original: yang 'di slu ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: yang 'di slu ba ci zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is this speech deceptive?

original: de gal te 'gyur na mi shes pa kho na la 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de gal te 'gyur na mi shes pa kho na la 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it were, it would be only with regard to ignorance,

original: shes pa la ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa la ma yin te /
translated: not with regard to knowledge,

original: de mtha' gcig tu mi slu ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de mtha' gcig tu mi slu ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because knowledge is absolutely nondeceptive.

original: 'di ni 'jig rten na shin tu grags pa yang yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten na shin tu grags pa yang yin no //
translated: This is also very well known in the world.

original: rab rib de dang lhan cig 'jug go zhes pa ni rab rib bcas pa ste slu ba can no zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: rab rib de dang lhan cig 'jug go zhes pa ni rab rib bcas pa ste slu ba can no zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: “Together with the eye disease” means “together with the eye disease, it is deceptive.”

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i slu ba can yang 'khrul pa la sogs pa'i sgras nye bar blangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i slu ba can yang 'khrul pa la sogs pa'i sgras nye bar blangs pa'i phyir /
translated: “Deceptive with conceptualization” is also included by the word “mistaken,” etc.

original: 'di rnam par rtog pa med par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnam par rtog pa med par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this should be understood to be without conceptualization.

original: dran dang mngon par 'dod pa yang //
analyzed: dran dang mngon par 'dod pa yang //
translated: “Memory and desire”

original: zhes pa'i yang gi sgra 'di yang bsdu ba'i don dang rim pa tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa'i yang gi sgra 'di yang bsdu ba'i don dang rim pa tha dad pa ste /
translated: The word “also” has the meaning of inclusion and a different order.

original: rab rib bcas pa yang zhes pa 'di ltar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rab rib bcas pa yang zhes pa 'di ltar blta bar bya'o //
translated: “Together with the eye disease” should be viewed in this way.

original: des na don 'dir 'gyur te slu ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum ltar snang ba'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: des na don 'dir 'gyur te slu ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum ltar snang ba'o zhes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, this is the meaning: “Deceptive cognition is like a seeming direct perception.”

original: de ltan 'khrul pa rnam par rtog pa med pa yang gang la mi bslu ba der mngon sum nyid yin la /
analyzed: de ltan 'khrul pa rnam par rtog pa med pa yang gang la mi bslu ba der mngon sum nyid yin la /
translated: Thus, it is established that “mistaken cognition without conceptualization is direct perception when it is non-deceptive,

original: gang la slu ba der ni de ltar snang ba nyid do zhes pa 'di grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang la slu ba der ni de ltar snang ba nyid do zhes pa 'di grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: but when it is deceptive, it is just an appearance of that.”

original: de ltar gyur na 'gal ba ci yang med do //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na 'gal ba ci yang med do //
translated: If that is so, there is no contradiction at all.

original: rtog pa'i shes pa bzhin te /
analyzed: rtog pa'i shes pa bzhin te /
translated: Like a conceptual cognition.

original: ji ltar rtog pa'i shes pa ni rang nyid rtog pa la ltos nas mngon sum nyid dang / phyi rol gyi yul la ltos pas de ltar snang ba nyid mi 'gal ba de bzhin du ji skad bshad pa'i shes pa yang yul gyi dbye ba la ltos pas de gnyis ka'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rtog pa'i shes pa ni rang nyid rtog pa la ltos nas mngon sum nyid dang / phyi rol gyi yul la ltos pas de ltar snang ba nyid mi 'gal ba de bzhin du ji skad bshad pa'i shes pa yang yul gyi dbye ba la ltos pas de gnyis ka'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Just as a conceptual cognition is itself direct perception in dependence on itself being conceptual, and it is not contradictory that it appears that way in dependence on an external object, so too, the cognition explained above is both in dependence on the classification of the object.

original: 'dir yang zhes pa kho bo'i 'dod par ro //🔽bya dang bcas par rtogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes pa kho bo'i 'dod par ro // bya dang bcas par rtogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Here, “also” is in my assertion.🔽Because it is understood together with the object.

original: zhes pa bya ba dang lhan cig rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: zhes pa bya ba dang lhan cig rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning is: because it is understood together with the object.

original: 'di ni tshad ma nyid du nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad ma nyid du nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: This is the cause for positing it as valid knowledge.

original: tshad ma 'bras bu kho nar yod //
analyzed: tshad ma 'bras bu kho nar yod //
translated: Valid knowledge exists only as the result.

original: ces pa tshad ma'i rtogs pa ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: ces pa tshad ma'i rtogs pa ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The meaning of “valid knowledge” is the result.

original: de yang rang nyid kho na ste /
analyzed: de yang rang nyid kho na ste /
translated: Moreover, it is only itself.

original: de'i bdag nyid do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid do zhes pa'o //
translated: It is of the nature of that.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference.

original: 'di la phyi rol pa rnams kyi bzhin du tshad ma las 'bras bu don gzhan med ces pa /
analyzed: 'di la phyi rol pa rnams kyi bzhin du tshad ma las 'bras bu don gzhan med ces pa /
translated: Here, just like the non-Buddhists, [we say that] there is no effect that is a different object from the valid cognition.🔽Here, too, it is exactly the same.

original: 'dir yang de dang 'dra ba kho na'o skyon du ma gyur cig pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang de dang 'dra ba kho na'o skyon du ma gyur cig pa'o //
translated: Let there be no fault!

original: de kho na'i zhes pa la sogs pas don 'di gsal bar byas te /🔽rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi bsgrub bya'am /
analyzed: de kho na'i zhes pa la sogs pas don 'di gsal bar byas te / rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi bsgrub bya'am /
translated: This point is clarified by [the root verse that begins with] “Thatness . . .”

original: sgrub byed cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: sgrub byed cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: There is not the slightest probandum or probative reason that exists.

original: thams cad du bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi tha snyad ni rtogs pa'i ngo bo las ma 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi tha snyad ni rtogs pa'i ngo bo las ma 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Everywhere, the conventions of probandum and probative reason do not go beyond the nature of conceptualization.

original: 'dir @31a * //🔽yang yod de /
analyzed: 'dir @31a * // yang yod de /
translated: Here,🔽there is [a probandum and probative reason].

original: shes pa ni lhag par rtogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir na bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi rtogs pa'o zhes pa 'bras bu nyid du nye bar gdags par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa ni lhag par rtogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir na bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi rtogs pa'o zhes pa 'bras bu nyid du nye bar gdags par bya'o //
translated: Since cognition is the nature of realization, it is the realization that is the probandum. It is designated as the effect.

original: de kho na'i 'ang yul gyi rnam pa yongs su 'dzin pa las dang / bya ba dang bcas par rtogs pa zhes pas tshad ma nyid du nye bar gdags te tha snyad du bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de kho na'i 'ang yul gyi rnam pa yongs su 'dzin pa las dang / bya ba dang bcas par rtogs pa zhes pas tshad ma nyid du nye bar gdags te tha snyad du bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that it is conventionally called valid knowledge.

original: de ltar ni shes pa de yul gyi rnam pa nyid 'dzin pa ni bya ba med par gyur kyang gang rang gi yul la rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi bya bas brjod kyi rnam par gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ni shes pa de yul gyi rnam pa nyid 'dzin pa ni bya ba med par gyur kyang gang rang gi yul la rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi bya bas brjod kyi rnam par gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: In this way, although the apprehension of the aspect of the object by that consciousness is not an action, it is said to be an action by virtue of its nature of realizing its object, not in any other way.

original: de'i phyir de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i yul gyi rnam pa nyid de kho na tshad ma'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i yul gyi rnam pa nyid de kho na tshad ma'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the aspect of the object that is of the same nature as that is valid knowledge.

original: 'di ni rigs pa yang yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rigs pa yang yin te /
translated: This is also reasonable.

original: de ltar ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni /
translated: In this way,

original: bya ba sgrub par byed pa zhes pa kho nas /
analyzed: bya ba sgrub par byed pa zhes pa kho nas /
translated: by virtue of the phrase “accomplishing the action,”

original: bya ba thams cad kyi thams cad sgrub par byed pa'am /
analyzed: bya ba thams cad kyi thams cad sgrub par byed pa'am /
translated: all actions are accomplished or

original: bya ba thams cad ni thams cad kyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bya ba thams cad ni thams cad kyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: all actions are not to be accomplished.

original: thug pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thug pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it would follow, absurdly, that there would be an infinite regress.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: gang zhig sgrub byed gang las bar ma chod par rab tu 'grub par 'gyur pa'i bya ba de'i de sgrub par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig sgrub byed gang las bar ma chod par rab tu 'grub par 'gyur pa'i bya ba de'i de sgrub par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, “What is the activity that is the agent of the object of action, which is not interrupted by anything else, and is the establishment of that?”

original: bya ba de kho na yang de'i bsgrub bya ste /🔽de la gzugs la sogs pa'i las la nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du 'dra ba'i bdag nyid can gyi shes pa ni gang gis 'di ni sngon po'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba de kho na yang de'i bsgrub bya ste / de la gzugs la sogs pa'i las la nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du 'dra ba'i bdag nyid can gyi shes pa ni gang gis 'di ni sngon po'i shes pa'o //
translated: That activity itself is the object of action of that.🔽The consciousness that has the nature of being similar to the experience of the object of action, such as form, is the agent that is posited as the distinguisher that distinguishes, “This is the consciousness of blue,” “This is the consciousness of yellow.”

original: 'di ni ser po'i'o zhes rnam par 'byed pas rnam par gzhag par bya ba'i byed par gyur pa'i rang bzhin des 'byung bar bya ste /🔽rnam pa gzhan du na shes pa thams cad don thams cad kyir 'gyur ba 'am yang na 'ga' zhig kyang 'ga' zhig gir mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ni ser po'i'o zhes rnam par 'byed pas rnam par gzhag par bya ba'i byed par gyur pa'i rang bzhin des 'byung bar bya ste / rnam pa gzhan du na shes pa thams cad don thams cad kyir 'gyur ba 'am yang na 'ga' zhig kyang 'ga' zhig gir mi 'gyur te /
translated: That nature should be produced.

original: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro//
translated: Otherwise, all consciousnesses would be the objects of all or, alternatively, nothing would be the object of anything because there would be no distinction.

original: dngos po la sogs pa'i mi gsal ba nyid la sogs pa tha dad pa ni nges par byed pa'o zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po la sogs pa'i mi gsal ba nyid la sogs pa tha dad pa ni nges par byed pa'o zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If it is said that the distinction of the indistinctness of the object and so on is the distinguisher, that is not so.

original: de ni shes pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni shes pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the nature of consciousness, and because it is the cause of all consciousnesses.

original: phrad pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: phrad pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there contact,

original: 'di nyid kho na'o phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid kho na'o phyir ro //
translated: because of just this.

original: don la lta ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: don la lta ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there the seeing of an object,

original: yul dang 'dra ba med na ni don la lta ba kho na mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro khyad par gyis shes pa yang de kho na nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang 'dra ba med na ni don la lta ba kho na mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro khyad par gyis shes pa yang de kho na nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because if there is no similarity to the object, then the seeing of the object is not established. Nor is there a consciousness that is qualified, because of reality.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig gang las 'di ni sngon po kho na'i rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig gang las 'di ni sngon po kho na'i rtogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, from whatever it is that this is the cognition of blue alone,

original: ser po kho na'i'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i nges pa de don dang 'dra ba las gzhan las 'grub @31b pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ser po kho na'i'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i nges pa de don dang 'dra ba las gzhan las 'grub @31b pa ma yin no //
translated: the cognition of yellow alone, and so on, that ascertainment is not established from anything other than that which is similar to the object.

original: de'i phyir de kho na don rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na don rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, that which is similar to the object is the proof of the cognition of reality.

original: byed pa po thams cad nye bar sbyor na yang don 'di'i rtogs pa 'di'o zhes pa'i 'brel pa ni de kho na las bar ma chad par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po thams cad nye bar sbyor na yang don 'di'i rtogs pa 'di'o zhes pa'i 'brel pa ni de kho na las bar ma chad par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if all the agents are applied, the connection of this meaning with this understanding is established only from that without interruption.

original: de yang de'i sgrub par byed pa nyid ni rnam par gzhag pa'i rten yin pa nyid kyis yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang de'i sgrub par byed pa nyid ni rnam par gzhag pa'i rten yin pa nyid kyis yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, the establishment of that is the basis of the presentation, not the establishment.

original: 'grub par byed pa nyid kyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'grub par byed pa nyid kyis ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not by the establishment itself,

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: That may be so,

original: dngos por na tha dad pa med pa shes pa'i cha dag gcig nyid yin na gang bya ba de kho na byed pa po yin pa de'i phyir 'di 'gal ba'o zhe na de mi bden te /
analyzed: dngos por na tha dad pa med pa shes pa'i cha dag gcig nyid yin na gang bya ba de kho na byed pa po yin pa de'i phyir 'di 'gal ba'o zhe na de mi bden te /
translated: but if the part of consciousness that is not different in substance is the same, then that which is the action is the agent. Therefore, this is contradictory.

original: gang gi phyir dngos por na tha mi dad na yang /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos por na tha mi dad na yang /
translated: That is not correct, because even if there is no difference in substance,

original: gang 'di chos tha dad pa gzhal bya'i tshul nyid dang don rtogs pa zhes pa de na khas blang bar bya ba kho na ste /
analyzed: gang 'di chos tha dad pa gzhal bya'i tshul nyid dang don rtogs pa zhes pa de na khas blang bar bya ba kho na ste /
translated: the mode of the object of comprehension that is different from that is only to be accepted, and it is said that the object is understood.

original: ldog pa tha dad pa nye bar btags pa'i phyir dang / dngos po la tha dad pa med na yang rnam par shes pa'i snang ba tha dad pas bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa tha dad pa nye bar btags pa'i phyir dang / dngos po la tha dad pa med na yang rnam par shes pa'i snang ba tha dad pas bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the designation of difference in the opposite, and because of the establishment of the probandum and the probans by the difference of the appearance of consciousness, even though there is no difference in the entity.

original: dper na 'thung bar byed bzhin pa'i sbrang 'thung ngo //
analyzed: dper na 'thung bar byed bzhin pa'i sbrang 'thung ngo //
translated: For example, when one says, “I drink the drink,”

original: bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid 'dzin du 'jug go //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid 'dzin du 'jug go //
translated: one makes oneself drink oneself.

original: blos 'dzin no zhes pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: blos 'dzin no zhes pa lta bu ste /
translated: One holds with the mind.”

original: 'di ni dngos po la nges par gnas pa'i bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi tha snyad ma yin no zhes pas rtsod pa 'di med do //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po la nges par gnas pa'i bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi tha snyad ma yin no zhes pas rtsod pa 'di med do //
translated: This is not the usage of the probandum and the probans that is fixed in the entity. Therefore, this dispute does not exist.

original: ji lta ba'i bya ba med kyang de dang ldan pa nyid du snang par 'gyur ba ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji lta ba'i bya ba med kyang de dang ldan pa nyid du snang par 'gyur ba ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Even though there is no action of that sort, how is it that it appears as if it were endowed with that? It is said:

original: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, when one says, “I see the form with the eye,”

original: 'dir sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa gcig kho na nyams su myong la /
analyzed: 'dir sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa gcig kho na nyams su myong la /
translated: Here, only one aspect, such as blue, is experienced.

original: de rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid du gyur par nges par khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid du gyur par nges par khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: It must definitely be accepted that it becomes the nature of consciousness.

original: gzhan du na de don dang 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de don dang 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be related to the object.

original: de las tha dad pa de'i rnam pa'am de'i rnam pa ma yin pa phyi rol gyi dngos po nye bar dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de las tha dad pa de'i rnam pa'am de'i rnam pa ma yin pa phyi rol gyi dngos po nye bar dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is an external object that is different from it, either in the aspect of that or in a different aspect, apprehended nearby.

original: dmigs pa 'thad pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa 'thad pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the object tenable.

original: ci ltar mi 'thad ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar mi 'thad ce na /
translated: How is it not tenable?

original: ji ltar 'thad pa ma yin pa de ltar rtsod pa sgrub pa rtag par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar 'thad pa ma yin pa de ltar rtsod pa sgrub pa rtag par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: How it is not tenable will be explained in the chapter on the proof of the thesis.

original: gang yang 'di ltar rtog par byed de /
analyzed: gang yang 'di ltar rtog par byed de /
translated: Now, someone might think as follows:

original: rgyu gzhan rnams yod pa na yang 'bras bu shes pa mi skye bas ni rgyu gzhan gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan rnams yod pa na yang 'bras bu shes pa mi skye bas ni rgyu gzhan gsal bar byed de /
translated: Even when other causes exist, if the effect, consciousness, does not arise, other causes are clarified,

original: de phyi rol gyi don du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de phyi rol gyi don du 'gyur ro //
translated: and that becomes an external object.

original: de'i phyir ldog pa las phyi rol gyi don 'grub po zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ldog pa las phyi rol gyi don 'grub po zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore external objects are established from the exclusion of that.

original: de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs te /
translated: But that also is not correct.

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu rnam par shes pa mi 'grub pa ni rnam par shes pa'i bag chags @32a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu rnam par shes pa mi 'grub pa ni rnam par shes pa'i bag chags @32a * //
translated: Because the effect, consciousness, is not established.🔽

original: yongs su smin pa ma tshang ba las kyang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su smin pa ma tshang ba las kyang 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the effect, consciousness, is not established, it is also due to the incompleteness of the ripening of the latent imprints for consciousness.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa las log pa'i yang dag par myong ba 'ga' yang srid pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa las log pa'i yang dag par myong ba 'ga' yang srid pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not possible for there to be any real experience that is different from consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa kho na rang rig par skye'o zhes pas rang rig pa kho na 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa kho na rang rig par skye'o zhes pas rang rig pa kho na 'bras bu'o //
translated: Since it is consciousness itself that arises as reflexive awareness, reflexive awareness is the only effect.

original: phyi rol gyi don yod du chug mod /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don yod du chug mod /
translated: Even if external objects existed,

original: de lta na'ang myong ba ji lta ba bzhin kho nar yul nges so zhes pa de kho na 'bras bur rigs so //
analyzed: de lta na'ang myong ba ji lta ba bzhin kho nar yul nges so zhes pa de kho na 'bras bur rigs so //
translated: it would still be reasonable for the ascertainment of the object to be the only effect, just as it is experienced.

original: gang las ji ltar 'di rnam par gnas pa'i rang gi ngo po de ltar nges par nus pa /
analyzed: gang las ji ltar 'di rnam par gnas pa'i rang gi ngo po de ltar nges par nus pa /
translated: From what is it possible to ascertain the intrinsic nature of this object as it is established?

original: rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du don nyams su myong ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du don nyams su myong ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the experience of the object as it is in reality,

original: shes pa rnam thams cad rnam pa gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: shes pa rnam thams cad rnam pa gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: because it would follow that all consciousnesses would be of a single aspect.

original: rnam par rig pa rnams ni rnam pa du ma can rnams so //
analyzed: rnam par rig pa rnams ni rnam pa du ma can rnams so //
translated: The cognitions are of many forms.

original: de ltar ni dngos po gcig kho na la rtogs pa po'i bye brag gis bsal ba dang gzhan pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams nye bar dmigs la /
analyzed: de ltar ni dngos po gcig kho na la rtogs pa po'i bye brag gis bsal ba dang gzhan pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams nye bar dmigs la /
translated: Thus, in regard to a single entity, cognitions endowed with the forms of difference, non-difference, etc., are apprehended due to the differences in the cognizers.

original: dngos po gcig rnam pa du ma yang ma yin te du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po gcig rnam pa du ma yang ma yin te du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: But a single entity is not of many forms, because of the consequence of multiplicity.

original: de'i phyir don gyi rang bzhin ji lta bar nges par bya bar nus pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pas phyi rol dang cig shos kyi phyogs dag la mdo gcig kho nas 'bras bu'i khyad par rnam par gzhag pa byed par bzhed pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyi rang bzhin ji lta bar nges par bya bar nus pa ma yin no zhes dgongs pas phyi rol dang cig shos kyi phyogs dag la mdo gcig kho nas 'bras bu'i khyad par rnam par gzhag pa byed par bzhed pas gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is not possible to ascertain the nature of the object as it is. Thinking this, the author, intending to establish the difference in the result by a single sūtra in regard to the externalist and other schools, states:

original: yang na rang rig 'dir 'bras bu zhes pa ste /
analyzed: yang na rang rig 'dir 'bras bu zhes pa ste /
translated: Or, self-awareness is the result here.

original: snga mar yul rig pa 'bras bur gsungs te /
analyzed: snga mar yul rig pa 'bras bur gsungs te /
translated: In the previous [verse], the awareness of the object is stated as the result.

original: de'i phyir yang na'i sgra ni rnam par brtag pa'i don can no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang na'i sgra ni rnam par brtag pa'i don can no //
translated: Therefore, the word 'or' has the meaning of consideration.

original: 'dir zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i mngon sum la'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i mngon sum la'o //
translated: “Here” refers to the previously explained perception.

original: rang gi snang ba dang yul gyi snang ba'i zhes pa /
analyzed: rang gi snang ba dang yul gyi snang ba'i zhes pa /
translated: “The appearance of itself and the appearance of the object” means

original: 'di'i snang ba rang nyid do zhes pa rang gi snang ba ste /
analyzed: 'di'i snang ba rang nyid do zhes pa rang gi snang ba ste /
translated: “the appearance of this is itself” is the appearance of itself.

original: rang gi ngo bo'i snang ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo'i snang ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means the appearance of its own nature and the aspect of grasping.

original: rang gi ngo bo kho na shes pa 'di'i snang ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo kho na shes pa 'di'i snang ba ste /
translated: Only its own nature is the appearance of this consciousness.

original: gang gi phyir shes pa yi ni shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa ngo bo de rang nyid kho nas snang ngo zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa yi ni shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa ngo bo de rang nyid kho nas snang ngo zhes byas nas so //
translated: Because it is said that the nature of consciousness is the nature of consciousness itself.

original: yul gyi snang ba zhes pa 'dir /
analyzed: yul gyi snang ba zhes pa 'dir /
translated: “The appearance of the object” means

original: gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi yul la brten pa de'i tshe yul lta bur snang ba 'di'o zhes chig rnam par spyar zhing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi yul la brten pa de'i tshe yul lta bur snang ba 'di'o zhes chig rnam par spyar zhing /
translated: when it is based on an external object, at that time it appears as if it were an object.

original: gang gi tshe mi brtan pa de'i tshe ni yul 'di'i snang ba'o zhes so //
analyzed: gang gi tshe mi brtan pa de'i tshe ni yul 'di'i snang ba'o zhes so //
translated: When it is not stable, at that time it is the appearance of this object.

original: yul ni 'dir gzung bya'i cha ste /
analyzed: yul ni 'dir gzung bya'i cha ste /
translated: The object here is the part to be grasped,

original: de la yul du tha snyad byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yul du tha snyad byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is conventionally designated as an object.

original: de'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The verse that begins, “That which is the result of that . . .”

original: phyi rol gyi don yod dam med na yang rung ste /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don yod dam med na yang rung ste /
translated: Whether external objects exist or not,

original: gnyis @32b snang ba can gyi shes pa nyams su myong la /
analyzed: gnyis @32b snang ba can gyi shes pa nyams su myong la /
translated: the experience of consciousness is of two appearances.

original: de'i gang rang rig ba rang nyams su myong ba de 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i gang rang rig ba rang nyams su myong ba de 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is the experience of reflexive awareness is the result.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa rigs pa cis te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa rigs pa cis te /
translated: Why? What is the reason?

original: rang rig pa srid pa'o zhes pa kho nas 'bras bu nyid du brtag par rigs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang rig pa srid pa'o zhes pa kho nas 'bras bu nyid du brtag par rigs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable to posit reflexive awareness alone as the result,

original: phyi rol gyi don gyi phyogs la ni 'di mi srid do //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don gyi phyogs la ni 'di mi srid do //
translated: because it is impossible in the case of external objects.

original: gang gi phyir yul rtogs pa'i phyir du ni mig la sogs pa rnams kyi bya ba yod kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yul rtogs pa'i phyir du ni mig la sogs pa rnams kyi bya ba yod kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma yin pas so //
translated: The function of the eye and so on is for the sake of the apprehension of objects, not for the sake of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa nye bar dmigs pa kho na yul nye bar dmigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nye bar dmigs pa kho na yul nye bar dmigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The apprehension of an object is not the mere apprehension of consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa las yul tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las yul tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object is different from consciousness.

original: de'i phyir rang rig pa 'bras bu nyid du mi 'thad do zhes sems pa'i dri ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rig pa 'bras bu nyid du mi 'thad do zhes sems pa'i dri ba'o //
translated: This is the question.

original: de yi ngo bos don nges phyir //
analyzed: de yi ngo bos don nges phyir //
translated: “Because the object is ascertained by its nature”

original: zhes pa rgyu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rgyu'o //
translated: is the reason.

original: gang gi tshe ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di kho na'i rnam par bshad pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di kho na'i rnam par bshad pa ste /
translated: “When” and so on is the explanation of just that.

original: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don la'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don la'o //
translated: The word “ni” has the meaning of “because.”

original: gang gi phyir gang gi tshe yul dang bcas pa'i shes pa don yin pa de'i tshe rang rig pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i don 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa rtogs pa pos rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang gi tshe yul dang bcas pa'i shes pa don yin pa de'i tshe rang rig pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i don 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa rtogs pa pos rtogs par byed de /
translated: Because when consciousness with an object is the object, then the one who realizes it realizes the object that is in accordance with reflexive awareness, whether it is asserted or not.

original: de'i phyir rang rig pa 'bras bur rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rig pa 'bras bur rigs so //
translated: Therefore it is reasonable that reflexive awareness is the effect.

original: yul dang bcas pa zhes pa yul dang lhan cig pa ni yul dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: yul dang bcas pa zhes pa yul dang lhan cig pa ni yul dang bcas pa'o //
translated: “With an object” means together with an object.

original: de la shes bya nang gi phyogs la gzung bya'i cha shas kyi mtshan nyid can gyi yul gyis yul dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: de la shes bya nang gi phyogs la gzung bya'i cha shas kyi mtshan nyid can gyi yul gyis yul dang bcas pa ste /
translated: In the case of the position that the object of knowledge is internal, the object is the aspect of the object that is to be apprehended.

original: de kho na la yul du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na la yul du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because it is posited as the object in that case.

original: phyi rol gyi don gyi phyogs la ni phyi rol gyi dang ngo //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don gyi phyogs la ni phyi rol gyi dang ngo //
translated: In the case of external objects, the external object is the object.

original: de la rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la ni rnam par shes pa las tha dad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la ni rnam par shes pa las tha dad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir /
translated: In the case of mere representation, there is no entity that is different from consciousness.

original: blo kho na gang gi tshe 'dod par rang gi rnam pa nyams su myong ba de'i tshe don 'dod par nges par byed la /
analyzed: blo kho na gang gi tshe 'dod par rang gi rnam pa nyams su myong ba de'i tshe don 'dod par nges par byed la /
translated: Therefore, when the mind itself experiences its own form, it is ascertained that the object is desired.

original: bzlog pa las ni bzlog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa las ni bzlog par 'gyur ro //
translated: When it is reversed, it is reversed.

original: ci ltar shes pa bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid nyams su myong /
analyzed: ci ltar shes pa bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid nyams su myong /
translated: How does consciousness experience itself?

original: de kho na la las dang byed pa po dang byed pa'i dngos po rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de kho na la las dang byed pa po dang byed pa'i dngos po rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the relation of action and agent is not tenable in that case.

original: 'di ni 'di lta bu ste /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di lta bu ste /
translated: This is the case.

original: don dam par na de la sogs pa'i dngos po med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: don dam par na de la sogs pa'i dngos po med pa kho na'o //
translated: In reality, there are no such entities.

original: de lta na yang de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir rab tu gsal ba bzhin du /
analyzed: de lta na yang de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir rab tu gsal ba bzhin du /
translated: Nevertheless, because it has that nature, it is like a clear manifestation.

original: de la de ltar tha snyad byed pa mi 'gal te /
analyzed: de la de ltar tha snyad byed pa mi 'gal te /
translated: It is not contradictory to conventionally designate it in that way.

original: rab tu gsal ba ni bdag nyid rab tu gsal ba sgron ma gzhan la ltos pa ma yin la /🔽dngos por na bdag nyid rab tu gsal @33a * //
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba ni bdag nyid rab tu gsal ba sgron ma gzhan la ltos pa ma yin la / dngos por na bdag nyid rab tu gsal @33a * //
translated: It is self-luminous, not dependent on another light.

original: bar byed pa yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bar byed pa yang ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that it illuminates itself,

original: rab tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid du skye bzhin pa la bdag nyid rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o zhes brjod pa 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid du skye bzhin pa la bdag nyid rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o zhes brjod pa 'ba' zhig go //
translated: but it is said that the self-illuminating is produced in the self-luminous nature.

original: de bzhin du myong ba'i bdag nyid du skye bzhin pa'i blo ni bdag nyid rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes tha snyad du bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du myong ba'i bdag nyid du skye bzhin pa'i blo ni bdag nyid rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes tha snyad du bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the cognition that is produced in the nature of experience is said to be self-illuminating.

original: phyi rol gyi phyogs la yang myong ba ji lta ba bzhin kho nar don rtogs kyi don ji lta ba bzhin myong ba ni ma yin no zhes sngar kho nar bshad zin to //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi phyogs la yang myong ba ji lta ba bzhin kho nar don rtogs kyi don ji lta ba bzhin myong ba ni ma yin no zhes sngar kho nar bshad zin to //
translated: And in the case of external objects, it was previously explained that the object is cognized just as it is experienced, but it is not experienced just as it is.

original: 'o na rang rig pa dang rjes su mthun par 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa'i don rtogs par byed ces pa 'di tsam gyis mi brjod par gang gi tshe shes pa yul dang bcas pa don yin pa de'i tshe zhes pa 'di yis ci zhe na dgos pa yod
analyzed: 'o na rang rig pa dang rjes su mthun par 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa'i don rtogs par byed ces pa 'di tsam gyis mi brjod par gang gi tshe shes pa yul dang bcas pa don yin pa de'i tshe zhes pa 'di yis ci zhe na dgos pa yod
translated: One might ask, Why is it not sufficient to simply say 'one understands the object that is in accordance with or not in accordance with reflexive awareness'? What is the need for saying 'when the object is the cognition together with the object'?

original: de / gang gi phyir sngar rang rig pa tshad mar bshad la /
analyzed: de / gang gi phyir sngar rang rig pa tshad mar bshad la /
translated: The reason is that earlier reflexive awareness was explained to be a valid cognition.

original: des kyang shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na rig par bya ba'o zhes rang rig pa ni de kho na'i 'bras bu zhes gsal bar nges par bya zhing /
analyzed: des kyang shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na rig par bya ba'o zhes rang rig pa ni de kho na'i 'bras bu zhes gsal bar nges par bya zhing /
translated: And since it is also the case that reflexive awareness is the result of that alone, it is clearly ascertained that the object of reflexive awareness is the essence of cognition itself.

original: de nas kyang rang rig pa dang rjes su mthun par 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa'i don rtogs par byed do zhes pa 'di tsam brjod pa na /
analyzed: de nas kyang rang rig pa dang rjes su mthun par 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa'i don rtogs par byed do zhes pa 'di tsam brjod pa na /
translated: Then, when one simply says one understands the object that is in accordance with or not in accordance with reflexive awareness,

original: rang rig pa'i mngon sum kho na'i dbang du byas nas 'di 'bras bur rnam par gzhag go zhes 'ga' zhig dogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: rang rig pa'i mngon sum kho na'i dbang du byas nas 'di 'bras bur rnam par gzhag go zhes 'ga' zhig dogs par 'gyur la /
translated: some may suspect that this is posited as the result from the perspective of reflexive awareness alone.

original: 'di ni tshad ma thams cad kyi 'bras bu zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad ma thams cad kyi 'bras bu zhes pa'o //
translated: But this is the result of all valid cognitions.

original: de'i phyir dogs pa bzlog pa'i don du /
analyzed: de'i phyir dogs pa bzlog pa'i don du /
translated: Therefore, in order to eliminate that doubt,

original: gang gi tshe ni shes pa yul dang bcas pa don zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ni shes pa yul dang bcas pa don zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is said, “When consciousness and its object are the object.”

original: don gyi sgra 'di yang gzhal bya rjod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi sgra 'di yang gzhal bya rjod par byed pa'o //
translated: The word “object” here refers to the object of comprehension.

original: yul dang bcas pa zhes pa 'di yang mtha' dag pa la mi zad par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yul dang bcas pa zhes pa 'di yang mtha' dag pa la mi zad par gyur pa'o //
translated: “ Together with its object” means that it is not exhausted in the totality.

original: de'i phyir 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, this is what is being said:🔽When consciousness is dependent on the object of comprehension of valid knowledge, then it is the object that is cognized in accordance with autocognition.

original: gang gi tshe shes pa tshad ma'i gzhal byar ltos pa de'i tshe rang rig pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i don rtogs par byed do zhes pas rang rig pa 'bras bu yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: gang gi tshe shes pa tshad ma'i gzhal byar ltos pa de'i tshe rang rig pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i don rtogs par byed do zhes pas rang rig pa 'bras bu yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Thus, autocognition is not only the effect;

original: 'on kyang gang gi tshe yang yul yin pa de'i tshe yang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang gi tshe yang yul yin pa de'i tshe yang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: but also, when it is the object, then it is that.

original: 'dir phyi rol gyi don med na rang rig pa 'bras bur rnam par 'jog pa la /
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol gyi don med na rang rig pa 'bras bur rnam par 'jog pa la /
translated: Here, if there is no external object, autocognition is posited as the effect.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tshad ma nyid du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tshad ma nyid du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The aspect of the apprehender is explained to be valid knowledge.

original: de las kyang phyi rol gyi don gzhal bar bya ba med pa na ji ltar rang rig pa 'bras bur rnam par gzhag pa la 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tshad mar 'dod pa de ltar phyi rol gyi don gzhal bar bya ba yod pa la yang 'dzin pa'i rnam
analyzed: de las kyang phyi rol gyi don gzhal bar bya ba med pa na ji ltar rang rig pa 'bras bur rnam par gzhag pa la 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tshad mar 'dod pa de ltar phyi rol gyi don gzhal bar bya ba yod pa la yang 'dzin pa'i rnam
translated: Moreover, when there is no external object to be perceived, how can you posit reflexive awareness as the effect? Just as you assert the aspect of the apprehender to be valid cognition, in the same way, when there is an external object to be perceived, the aspect of the apprehender alone is valid cognition.

original: pa kho na tshad ma'o zhes dogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: pa kho na tshad ma'o zhes dogs par 'gyur te /
translated: This is how you might suspect.

original: de'i @33b phyir de bsal ba'i ched du gsungs pa /🔽gang gi tshe ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i @33b phyir de bsal ba'i ched du gsungs pa / gang gi tshe ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: To dispel that, the root text says:🔽When there is no external object to be perceived, how can you posit the aspect of the apprehender as valid cognition?

original: phyi rol gzhal bya la rang rig pa 'bras bur 'jog pa na yang yul gyi snang ba nyid kho na shes pa tshad mar 'dod kyi /
analyzed: phyi rol gzhal bya la rang rig pa 'bras bur 'jog pa na yang yul gyi snang ba nyid kho na shes pa tshad mar 'dod kyi /
translated: Even when reflexive awareness is posited as the effect in the perception of an external object, the appearance of the object alone is asserted to be the valid cognition of consciousness.

original: rnam par rig pa tsam nyid bzhin du 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rig pa tsam nyid bzhin du 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The aspect of the apprehender is not like mere awareness.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi don gzhal bya'o zhes pa'i phyogs de'i tshe yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa mngon par 'dod pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi don gzhal bya'o zhes pa'i phyogs de'i tshe yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa mngon par 'dod pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Well, when there is an external object to be perceived, isn’t the aspect of the apprehender clearly asserted to be valid cognition?

original: de ni rang rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is to be known by itself.

original: de ci'i phyir de'i tshe tshad ma nyid du rnam par gzhag pa ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir de'i tshe tshad ma nyid du rnam par gzhag pa ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it not posited as valid cognition at that time? It is said:

original: de'i tshe ni shes par rig par bya ba yin yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe ni shes par rig par bya ba yin yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “At that time, although it is to be known by consciousness…”

original: shes pa ni rang rig par bya ba'o zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: shes pa ni rang rig par bya ba'o zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: Consciousness is to be known by itself. The words are to be connected in this way.

original: gal te yang rang rig par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo dus thams cad du yod pa de lta na yang de la mi ltos par phyi rol gzhal bar bya ba la shes pa'i yul gyi snang ba nyid kho na tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te yang rang rig par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo dus thams cad du yod pa de lta na yang de la mi ltos par phyi rol gzhal bar bya ba la shes pa'i yul gyi snang ba nyid kho na tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: Even if the nature of what is to be known by itself exists at all times, still, in regard to the external object of evaluation, the appearance as the object of consciousness is the only valid cognition, not depending on that.

original: rang gi snang ba nyid ni ma yin te /🔽phyi rol gyi don la de sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi snang ba nyid ni ma yin te / phyi rol gyi don la de sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not its own appearance,🔽because it is not reasonable that it proves the external object.

original: mi rigs pa ni gzhan gyi don can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: mi rigs pa ni gzhan gyi don can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: It is not reasonable because it is not for the sake of another.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa bdag nyid kyi yul can ni ci ltar phyi rol gyi don la tshad mar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa bdag nyid kyi yul can ni ci ltar phyi rol gyi don la tshad mar 'gyur /
translated: How can a subjective aspect that apprehends itself be a valid cognition in regard to an external object?

original: gzhan gyi yul can gzhan la tshad ma nyid du rigs pa ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi yul can gzhan la tshad ma nyid du rigs pa ni ma yin pas so //
translated: It is not reasonable that a subjective aspect that apprehends another object be a valid cognition in regard to that other object.

original: gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pas de mtshan ma nyid la rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pas de mtshan ma nyid la rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: In response, Dharmakīrti states that the reason is the sign itself.

original: gzhal bar bya zhes pa nges par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhal bar bya zhes pa nges par bya ba'o //
translated: The object of comprehension is that which is to be ascertained.

original: ji lta ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the passage beginning “Just as . . .”

original: shes pa ni shes bya'i rnam pa'i dbang gis phyi rol gyi don nges pa'o zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: shes pa ni shes bya'i rnam pa'i dbang gis phyi rol gyi don nges pa'o zhes pa'i don no //
translated: is that the external object is ascertained by means of the aspect of the object of knowledge that appears to consciousness.

original: 'dir yang dper na du bas me rjes su dpag par bya ba'o zhes brjod pa na 'di dngos su de'i rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang dper na du bas me rjes su dpag par bya ba'o zhes brjod pa na 'di dngos su de'i rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Here, for example, when it is said that fire is inferred from smoke, it is not that the fire is directly inferred.

original: 'o na ci zhe na de'i rgyu can gyi du ba'i shes bas yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na de'i rgyu can gyi du ba'i shes bas yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: What is it then? It is the cognition of smoke that is caused by fire.

original: gal te yang /
analyzed: gal te yang /
translated: In the same way,

original: don de de yis gzhal bar bya //
analyzed: don de de yis gzhal bar bya //
translated: if the object is to be comprehended by that cognition,🔽then the object is comprehended by the cognition that is caused by the object.

original: zhes brjod pa de lta na'ang de'i sgrub par byed pa can rang rig pas zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod pa de lta na'ang de'i sgrub par byed pa can rang rig pas zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Although this is said, it is to be understood that the proof of that is by means of autocognition.

original: de ltar ni ji lta ji ltar don gyi rnam pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor shes pa la nges par gnas pa de lta de ltar rang rig pa rgyas par byed la /
analyzed: de ltar ni ji lta ji ltar don gyi rnam pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor shes pa la nges par gnas pa de lta de ltar rang rig pa rgyas par byed la /
translated: In this way, just as the aspect of the object is ascertained in consciousness as having the nature of the pleasant, unpleasant, and so on, just so autocognition is ascertained.

original: ji lta ji ltar de ston pa de lta de ltar sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i don rnam par nges so //🔽gang @34a * //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar de ston pa de lta de ltar sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i don rnam par nges so // gang @34a * //
translated: And just as that is ascertained, just so the object, such as form, is ascertained as pleasant, unpleasant, and so on.

original: gi phyir gal te de'i rnam par skyes par gyur na de'i tshe de 'dra'i bdag nyid kyi rang rig par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gi phyir gal te de'i rnam par skyes par gyur na de'i tshe de 'dra'i bdag nyid kyi rang rig par 'gyur la /
translated: If it arises in the aspect of that, then at that time it would be autocognition having such a nature.

original: de las kyang de'i dbang las yul nges par 'gyur gyi gzhan du na ma yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang de'i dbang las yul nges par 'gyur gyi gzhan du na ma yin no //
translated: And from that, the object would be ascertained by the power of that, but not otherwise.

original: de'i phyir yul gyi snang ba nyid tshad ma'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul gyi snang ba nyid tshad ma'o //
translated: Therefore the appearance of the object itself is valid knowledge.

original: 'o na 'dir yul dang 'dra ba nyid rang rig pa'i ngor sgrub par byed pa nyid du rtogs par byed par 'dod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na 'dir yul dang 'dra ba nyid rang rig pa'i ngor sgrub par byed pa nyid du rtogs par byed par 'dod pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t it maintained here that the object itself is established in the perspective of reflexive awareness?

original: de'i phyir / gang gi phyir de'i dbang las de ston to zhes brjod par bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i phyir / gang gi phyir de'i dbang las de ston to zhes brjod par bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “Because it is taught that it is due to the power of that.”

original: ci'i don du gang gi phyir /
analyzed: ci'i don du gang gi phyir /
translated: For what purpose is it said, “Because it is due to the power of that”?

original: don de de yis gzhal bar bya //🔽zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: don de de yis gzhal bar bya // zhes brjod ce na /
translated: “That object is to be cognized by that.”

original: dgos pa yod de /
analyzed: dgos pa yod de /
translated: This is necessary.

original: rang rig pa de ni don rig pa'i bya ba gang yin pa don rnam par nges pa de byed de /
analyzed: rang rig pa de ni don rig pa'i bya ba gang yin pa don rnam par nges pa de byed de /
translated: Reflexive awareness performs the action of cognizing the object, and it determines the object.

original: de'i phyir nye bar btags pa'i don rig pa kho nar 'bras bu las blta bar bya'o zhes pa'i don 'di gsal bar bya ba'i ched du de skad gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar btags pa'i don rig pa kho nar 'bras bu las blta bar bya'o zhes pa'i don 'di gsal bar bya ba'i ched du de skad gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of “cognizing the object” is imputed to it. The meaning of this is stated in order to clarify it.

original: de ltar na ni tshad ma dang 'bras bu dag yul tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na ni tshad ma dang 'bras bu dag yul tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, the valid knowledge and the result would not be different objects.

original: phyi rol gang kho na la sgrub par byed ba yin pa de kho na la rang rig pa'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: phyi rol gang kho na la sgrub par byed ba yin pa de kho na la rang rig pa'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: It is because it is said, “It is reflexive awareness with regard to that very external object that is established.”

original: 'o na rang rig pa 'bras bu ci ltar gsungs she na /
analyzed: 'o na rang rig pa 'bras bu ci ltar gsungs she na /
translated: Well, if reflexive awareness is the result, how is it taught?

original: don dam par te /
analyzed: don dam par te /
translated: It is taught in the ultimate sense.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir rang rig pa 'bras bur gsungs la /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir rang rig pa 'bras bur gsungs la /
translated: Because it is of the nature of that, reflexive awareness is taught to be the result.

original: nye bar btags pas ni 'bras bu las don rig pa kho nar de blta bar bya'o zhes pas mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: nye bar btags pas ni 'bras bu las don rig pa kho nar de blta bar bya'o zhes pas mi 'gal lo //
translated: But it should be understood that the result is only the awareness of the object by means of the result.

original: 'dir rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tshad ma dang gzung bya'i rnam pa gzhal bya'o zhes 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tshad ma dang gzung bya'i rnam pa gzhal bya'o zhes 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: Here, it will be explained that mere awareness itself is the aspect of the apprehender, the valid cognition, and the aspect of the apprehended object is the object of comprehension.

original: de'i phyir de la brtsad pa dogs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la brtsad pa dogs so //
translated: Therefore, the dispute is resolved.

original: de la 'di ni rtsod pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni rtsod pa ste /
translated: Here is the dispute:

original: gang gis phyi rol gyi don med na yang tshad ma la sogs par 'gyur ba tha dad pa med pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes pa'i 'dzin pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis phyi rol gyi don med na yang tshad ma la sogs par 'gyur ba tha dad pa med pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes pa'i 'dzin pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: If external objects do not exist, how can there be a division of the aspect of the apprehender in consciousness, which is of the nature of non-difference, into valid cognition and so on?

original: de'i phyir de'i lan gdab pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i lan gdab pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to answer that, it is said:

original: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus... and so on.

original: 'di ni 'di'i bsdus pa'i don te de kho na nyid du de'i rnam par dbye ba yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i bsdus pa'i don te de kho na nyid du de'i rnam par dbye ba yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: This is the summary meaning of this [chapter], for in reality there is no such differentiation.

original: ma rig pas nye bar bslad pa rnams kyis /🔽de 'dzin pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa bzhin du mtshon pa 'ba' zhig ste /
analyzed: ma rig pas nye bar bslad pa rnams kyis / de 'dzin pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa bzhin du mtshon pa 'ba' zhig ste /
translated: Those who are affected by ignorance🔽are like those who perceive the aspects of apprehending and so forth.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du tshad ma dang gzhal bya rnam par gzhag pa 'di bya'i /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du tshad ma dang gzhal bya rnam par gzhag pa 'di bya'i /
translated: Therefore, this establishment of valid cognition and the object of valid cognition should be understood as it is seen,

original: de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: but not as it is in reality.

original: rnam par dbye ba med par gyur pa yang ci ltar de ltar snang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba med par gyur pa yang ci ltar de ltar snang zhe na /
translated: But how can there be such an appearance without differentiation?

original: ji ltar @34b sngags la sogs pas dbang po nye bar bslad pa rnams kyis 'jim pa'i dum bu la sogs pa rnams glang po che la sogs pa'i gzugs dang bral ba rnams kyang glang po che la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams su so sor snang ba dang /
analyzed: ji ltar @34b sngags la sogs pas dbang po nye bar bslad pa rnams kyis 'jim pa'i dum bu la sogs pa rnams glang po che la sogs pa'i gzugs dang bral ba rnams kyang glang po che la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams su so sor snang ba dang /
translated: Just as those whose sense faculties are affected by spells and so forth perceive pieces of wood and so forth, which are devoid of the form of an elephant and so forth, as having the form of an elephant and so forth,

original: ji ltar thag ring por mya ngam rnams na chung du 'am chen por snang ba de lta ma rig pas long ba rnams kyi shes ba 'di yang de ltar gyur pa ma yin pa yang de ltar snang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar thag ring por mya ngam rnams na chung du 'am chen por snang ba de lta ma rig pas long ba rnams kyi shes ba 'di yang de ltar gyur pa ma yin pa yang de ltar snang ngo //
translated: Just as in the desert, a mirage appears as a small or large body of water, so also this consciousness of those blinded by ignorance appears as such, although it is not so.

original: sngags la sogs pa'i nus pa las de rnams de lta kho nar skyes pa'o zhes brtag par nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sngags la sogs pa'i nus pa las de rnams de lta kho nar skyes pa'o zhes brtag par nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible to suppose that they are born in that way by the power of spells and so on.

original: gang gi phyir mthong ba ma bslad pa de'i yul nye ba na gnas pa rnams kyis nge ltar mthong ba med pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mthong ba ma bslad pa de'i yul nye ba na gnas pa rnams kyis nge ltar mthong ba med pas so //
translated: Because those with uncorrupted vision do not see them that way when they are nearby.

original: de ltar zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa ste /
translated: Thus,

original: ji skad bshad pa'i snang ba gnyis pa'i shes pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i snang ba gnyis pa'i shes pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: the consciousness of the appearance as explained above.

original: shes pa'i rig pa zhes pa /
analyzed: shes pa'i rig pa zhes pa /
translated: The awareness of consciousness

original: shes pa las su gyur pa'i rig pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa las su gyur pa'i rig pa bstan pa'o //
translated: The awareness that is the object of consciousness is taught.

original: cir gyur pa zhe na /
analyzed: cir gyur pa zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rnam pa du ma ste /
analyzed: rnam pa du ma ste /
translated: It is manifold.

original: gang gi rnam pa du ma yin pa de de skad bshad do //
analyzed: gang gi rnam pa du ma yin pa de de skad bshad do //
translated: That which is manifold is explained as such.

original: rnam pa de rnams ni gang rnams 'khrul pa 'dis nges par mthong ba 'dzin pa'i snang ba la sogs pa de rnams brjod par 'dod ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de rnams ni gang rnams 'khrul pa 'dis nges par mthong ba 'dzin pa'i snang ba la sogs pa de rnams brjod par 'dod ba'o //
translated: Those aspects are the ones that are definitely seen by this delusion, the appearances of the apprehended and so forth. Those are what are intended to be expressed.

original: nye bar blangs nas zhes pa de tshad ma'i rgyur bzung nas so //
analyzed: nye bar blangs nas zhes pa de tshad ma'i rgyur bzung nas so //
translated: Having taken up means having taken that as the cause of valid knowledge.

original: de lta de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de lta de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: As for “in that way, in that way,” and so forth,

original: re zhig rtog pa med pa la /🔽'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ni mngon sum tshad ma ste /
analyzed: re zhig rtog pa med pa la / 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ni mngon sum tshad ma ste /
translated: first, in the absence of conception,🔽the absence of the aspect of the apprehender is direct valid knowledge.

original: gsal bar snang ba gzung bya'i rnam par rang gi mtshan nyid gzhal bya'o //
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba gzung bya'i rnam par rang gi mtshan nyid gzhal bya'o //
translated: The appearance of clarity is the aspect of the apprehended, the evaluated object of one’s own characteristics.

original: rtags las skyes pa la yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa rjes su dpag pa ni tshad ma ste /
analyzed: rtags las skyes pa la yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa rjes su dpag pa ni tshad ma ste /
translated: Also, that which arises from a sign, the aspect of the apprehender, is inference.

original: gsal bya'i bye brag la rjes su 'gro ba lta bu mi gsal bar snang ba gzung bya'i rnam pa spyi'i mtshan nyid ni gzhal bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gsal bya'i bye brag la rjes su 'gro ba lta bu mi gsal bar snang ba gzung bya'i rnam pa spyi'i mtshan nyid ni gzhal bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The appearance of clarity that is the aspect of the apprehended, the evaluated object of a universal characteristic, is like the one that follows the particular.

original: nye bar gdags par bya zhes pa tha snyad du bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar gdags par bya zhes pa tha snyad du bya ba'o //
translated: It is said that it is to be designated, that is, it is to be conventionally expressed.

original: 'dis 'di gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: 'dis 'di gsal bar byed de /
translated: This clarifies that.

original: 'di ni tha snyad pa'i tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i rang gi ngo bo brjod pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni tha snyad pa'i tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i rang gi ngo bo brjod pa ste /
translated: This is the statement of the nature of the conventional valid cognition and the object of comprehension.

original: 'di la yang log par rtogs pa rnams kyi kun du rmangs pa bsal ba'i ched du'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang log par rtogs pa rnams kyi kun du rmangs pa bsal ba'i ched du'o //
translated: And this is for the purpose of removing the confusion of those who have false understanding.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa kho na ni rnam par 'khrul pas dpen zhing dri ma med la nyams pa med pa don dam pa pa'i tshad ma ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa kho na ni rnam par 'khrul pas dpen zhing dri ma med la nyams pa med pa don dam pa pa'i tshad ma ste /
translated: The supramundane alone is the valid cognition of ultimate reality, free from error, stainless, and uncorrupted.

original: de kho na'i spyod yul yang dag pa ni gzhal bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na'i spyod yul yang dag pa ni gzhal bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: And the object of comprehension is the correct domain of that alone.

original: chos thams cad ni bya ba dang bral ba rnams so zhes pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni bya ba dang bral ba rnams so zhes pa ste /
translated: All phenomena are devoid of activity.

original: 'dis ni shes pa'i rig pa de 'khrul pa nyid du gsal bar byas so //🔽de kho na nyid du chos gang la @35a * //
analyzed: 'dis ni shes pa'i rig pa de 'khrul pa nyid du gsal bar byas so // de kho na nyid du chos gang la @35a * //
translated: This makes it clear that the cognition of consciousness is just an error.

original: yang rnam pa gcig min pa mthong ba'i bdag nyid kyi tha snyad srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang rnam pa gcig min pa mthong ba'i bdag nyid kyi tha snyad srid pa ma yin te /
translated: In reality, it is not possible to have a convention whose nature is the perception of any phenomenon as not being one.

original: rnam pa rnams yongs su ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa rnams yongs su ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the aspects are not fully established.

original: de ni 'khrul pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa kho na ste /
translated: That is just an error.

original: ma rig pas long ba rnams ni gang rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa'i rnam pa med pa'i shes pa la yang de ltar lta'o //
analyzed: ma rig pas long ba rnams ni gang rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa'i rnam pa med pa'i shes pa la yang de ltar lta'o //
translated: Those whose eyes are blinded by ignorance see it that way even in a consciousness that is without the aspect of that which is to be known and that which knows.

original: gal te de lta na de kho na nyid mi shes pa rnams kyi shes pa thams cad nye bar bslad pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na de kho na nyid mi shes pa rnams kyi shes pa thams cad nye bar bslad pa kho na yin na /
translated: If that is so, then if all the consciousnesses of those who do not know reality are only mistaken,

original: ci ltar tshad ma dang cig shos rnam par gzhag ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar tshad ma dang cig shos rnam par gzhag ce na /
translated: how are valid cognition and the others posited?

original: nye bar bslad pa'i bag chags kyi khyad par yong par gyur pa las te /
analyzed: nye bar bslad pa'i bag chags kyi khyad par yong par gyur pa las te /
translated: It is due to the arising of the specific latent potentialities of error.

original: gang gi phyir chu la sogs par snang ba'i shes pa las /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chu la sogs par snang ba'i shes pa las /
translated: Because from the consciousnesses that appear as water and so on,

original: reg pa dang btung ba dang ngoms pa la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams srid pa tha snyad la mi slu ba la ltos pas tshad ma ste /
analyzed: reg pa dang btung ba dang ngoms pa la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams srid pa tha snyad la mi slu ba la ltos pas tshad ma ste /
translated: the conditions of touching, drinking, and quenching thirst and so on are possible. In terms of conventional reality, they are undeceiving and therefore valid cognition.🔽The others are not valid cognition because they are free from the latent potentialities of such aspects.

original: cig shos ni rnam pa de lta bu'i bag chags dang bral ba'i phyir tshad ma ma yin pa'o zhes pa skyon med do //
analyzed: cig shos ni rnam pa de lta bu'i bag chags dang bral ba'i phyir tshad ma ma yin pa'o zhes pa skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault in this.

original: 'o na gang 'di 'bras bu las rgyu rjes su dpog pa de ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'o na gang 'di 'bras bu las rgyu rjes su dpog pa de ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: Well then, how is it that from the effect the cause is inferred?

original: ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why is it not so?

original: gang gi phyir du bar snang ba'i shes pa sngar kho nar gsal bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir du bar snang ba'i shes pa sngar kho nar gsal bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: Because the cognition that appears as smoke is already manifest,

original: phyis mer snang ba ste /
analyzed: phyis mer snang ba ste /
translated: and later the cognition that appears as fire.

original: de du bar snang ba'i shes pa las sngar nyams su myong ba ni med do //
analyzed: de du bar snang ba'i shes pa las sngar nyams su myong ba ni med do //
translated: The cognition that appears as smoke is not experienced later than the cognition that appears as smoke.

original: de'i phyir du ba me las skyes pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes pas ci ltar des me rjes su dpog ce na /
analyzed: de'i phyir du ba me las skyes pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes pas ci ltar des me rjes su dpog ce na /
translated: Therefore, smoke is only produced from fire. How does it infer fire?

original: skyon 'di ni med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di ni med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: me'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyed pa'i bag chags kyi khyad par dang ldan pa kho na'i sems kyi rgyud ni du bar snang ba'i blo skyed par byed kyi /
analyzed: me'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyed pa'i bag chags kyi khyad par dang ldan pa kho na'i sems kyi rgyud ni du bar snang ba'i blo skyed par byed kyi /
translated: Only a mental continuum that possesses the special latent potentialities for generating a cognition having the aspect of fire produces the cognition that appears as smoke.

original: gang ci yang rung bas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang ci yang rung bas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not produced by just anything.

original: de'i phyir de rtogs par byed pa'i du ba'i shes pa ni rtogs pa po'i bag chags gsal bar sad pa can me'i rnam pa can gyi blo 'byung bar 'gyur bar go bar byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de rtogs par byed pa'i du ba'i shes pa ni rtogs pa po'i bag chags gsal bar sad pa can me'i rnam pa can gyi blo 'byung bar 'gyur bar go bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, the cognition of smoke that causes one to understand that fire exists causes the cognition having the aspect of fire to arise in one whose latent potentialities are activated.

original: 'dir ni rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni rgyu'i chos rjes su dpag pa ste /
translated: Here, the property of the cause is inferred.

original: ro la sogs pa las gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du rjes su dpog par 'gyur ro zhes pas brtsad par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ro la sogs pa las gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du rjes su dpog par 'gyur ro zhes pas brtsad par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not to be disputed that one can infer form, etc. from taste, etc., as from form, etc.

original: smras pa yang zhes pa la sogs pas gzhal bya la sogs pa rnam par gzhag par de ston to 'di'i snang ba gang yin pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyor ro //
analyzed: smras pa yang zhes pa la sogs pas gzhal bya la sogs pa rnam par gzhag par de ston to 'di'i snang ba gang yin pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyor ro //
translated: He shows that in the statement “the object of valid knowledge, etc.,” the word “its” is to be connected with “appearance.”

original: rang gi cha shas tshad ma nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi cha shas tshad ma nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it establishes the valid knowledge of its own parts,

original: 'dir yul gyi snang ba gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yul gyi snang ba gzung bar bya'o //
translated: here the appearance of the object is to be apprehended.

original: de gzhal bya zhes pa yul gyi snang ba de gzhal bya'o //
analyzed: de gzhal bya zhes pa yul gyi snang ba de gzhal bya'o //
translated: That is the object of valid knowledge. That appearance of the object is the object of valid knowledge.

original: tshad ma 'bras bu nyid dag ni //
analyzed: tshad ma 'bras bu nyid dag ni //
translated: The result of valid knowledge is

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rig pa dag /🔽@35b ces pa ste /🔽'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni tshad ma nyid do //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rig pa dag / @35b ces pa ste / 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni tshad ma nyid do //
translated: the cognition that apprehends it.🔽The aspect of apprehension is valid knowledge.

original: yang dag par rig pa ni 'bras bu nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par rig pa ni 'bras bu nyid do //
translated: Correct cognition is the result.

original: 'dir yang gal te yang yang dag bar rig pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu nyung ba nyid mod de ltar na yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir de yang bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi dbang du byas pa nyid kyi phyir mchod🔽par 'os pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir yang gal te yang yang dag bar rig pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu nyung ba nyid mod de ltar na yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir de yang bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi dbang du byas pa nyid kyi phyir mchod par 'os pa nyid do //
translated: Here, too, if the sound of the voice of right cognition is very little, then, even so, because the aspect of apprehension is valid cognition, it is also to be specifically understood, and so it is worthy of worship.

original: de'i phyir 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i sgra kho na snga mar nges par gzhag go //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i sgra kho na snga mar nges par gzhag go //
translated: Therefore, the sound of the aspect of apprehension alone is posited as the former.

original: de phyir 'di gsum dbye ma byas //
analyzed: de phyir 'di gsum dbye ma byas //
translated: Therefore, these three are not differentiated.

original: zhes pa gsum ka yang de kho na nyid du yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir shes pa las logs par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa gsum ka yang de kho na nyid du yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir shes pa las logs par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Since all three are not fully established in reality, they are not to be taken as separate from consciousness.

original: 'dir tshul gnyis pa nyid khas blang par byas nas rang rig pa nyid 'bras bur brjod na /
analyzed: 'dir tshul gnyis pa nyid khas blang par byas nas rang rig pa nyid 'bras bur brjod na /
translated: Here, having accepted the very two modes, if self-awareness is stated as the result,

original: shes pa'i tshul gnyis pa de nyid kyang skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa'i tshul gnyis pa de nyid kyang skye ba ma yin te /
translated: that very two-fold mode of consciousness is not produced.

original: de'i 'thad pa med pa'i don phyir ro zhes bsams nas dris pa /
analyzed: de'i 'thad pa med pa'i don phyir ro zhes bsams nas dris pa /
translated: Thinking that its justification is meaningless, it is asked:

original: ci ste tshul gnyis pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci ste tshul gnyis pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “If it is the second method, etc.”

original: yang ci'i phyir tshul gsum pa nyid dri bar bya ba la tshul gnyis pa nyid dris she na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir tshul gsum pa nyid dri bar bya ba la tshul gnyis pa nyid dris she na /
translated: Moreover, why is the second method questioned when the third method is to be questioned?

original: tshul gnyis pa nyid grub na rang rig pa yang 'grub bo zhes dgongs pa las te /
analyzed: tshul gnyis pa nyid grub na rang rig pa yang 'grub bo zhes dgongs pa las te /
translated: It is because it is thought that if the second method is established, self-awareness is also established.

original: tshul gnyis pa nyid grub na ni bdag nyid du gyur pa'i yul dang 'dra ba ni shes pas yang dag par rig par bya bas so zhes don gyis bdag nyid rig pa 'grub bo //🔽yul shes pa la de shes pa'i //
analyzed: tshul gnyis pa nyid grub na ni bdag nyid du gyur pa'i yul dang 'dra ba ni shes pas yang dag par rig par bya bas so zhes don gyis bdag nyid rig pa 'grub bo // yul shes pa la de shes pa'i //
translated: If the second method is established, then it is established by implication that it is self-awareness, since the object is known by the consciousness that is like itself.

original: khyad par las ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: khyad par las ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The difference between the consciousness of the object and the consciousness of that” is the reason.

original: yul shes ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dzin pa mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: yul shes ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dzin pa mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The consciousness of the object is the eye consciousness, etc., which apprehends form, etc.

original: yul gyi shes pa la de shes pa ni yul shes pa la de shes pa la'o //
analyzed: yul gyi shes pa la de shes pa ni yul shes pa la de shes pa la'o //
translated: The consciousness of that is the consciousness of the object, i.e., the consciousness of the consciousness of the object.

original: 'dir gal te de'i sgras yul gyi shes pa la sbrel na /
analyzed: 'dir gal te de'i sgras yul gyi shes pa la sbrel na /
translated: Here, if the word that is connected to the consciousness of the object,

original: de nye bar blangs pa don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nye bar blangs pa don med par 'gyur te /
translated: then the addition of that is meaningless.

original: de med kyang yul gyi shes pa la dmigs pa'i shes pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang yul gyi shes pa la dmigs pa'i shes pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But even if that is not so, the cognition that is the object’s consciousness is realized.

original: de'i phyir de'i sgras nye bar blangs pa'i shugs las yon tan du gyur kyang yul la sbrel bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i sgras nye bar blangs pa'i shugs las yon tan du gyur kyang yul la sbrel bar bya ste /
translated: Therefore, although the quality is implied by the term “that,” it is connected to the object.

original: de las gzhan 'dir skabs su bab pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan 'dir skabs su bab pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the context here, it is not the other.

original: des 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: yul gyi shes pa la yul gyi rnam pa shes pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: yul gyi shes pa la yul gyi rnam pa shes pa zhes pa ste /
translated: The object’s consciousness is the consciousness of the aspect of the object.

original: de kho na khyad par ro //
analyzed: de kho na khyad par ro //
translated: That is the specific quality.

original: de ltar ni de yul gyi shes pa las lhag pa yul gyi rnam pas khyad par yod de /
analyzed: de ltar ni de yul gyi shes pa las lhag pa yul gyi rnam pas khyad par yod de /
translated: In that way, it is superior to the object’s consciousness because it has the specific quality of the object’s aspect.

original: pha rol po'i bsam pas de ltar gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: pha rol po'i bsam pas de ltar gsungs pa ste /
translated: This is stated from the perspective of the opponent.

original: pha rol po ni yul gyi shes pa la ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa 'ba' zhig 'dod la /
analyzed: pha rol po ni yul gyi shes pa la ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa 'ba' zhig 'dod la /
translated: The opponent asserts that the object’s consciousness is only the experienced aspect.

original: @36a * // de'i shes pa la ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa'ang yod do //
analyzed: @36a * // de'i shes pa la ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa'ang yod do //
translated: But its consciousness also has the experienced aspect.

original: 'dir yang blo'i nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa ni grub pa nyid kyi phyir de bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang blo'i nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa ni grub pa nyid kyi phyir de bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Here also, the aspect of the experience of awareness is established, and so it is not to be proven.

original: gang shes pa ni shes pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa ma yin pa'i rgol ba de 'ga' yang med pas so //
analyzed: gang shes pa ni shes pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa ma yin pa'i rgol ba de 'ga' yang med pas so //
