translated: Because there is no opponent at all who does not assert that what is known is the nature of consciousness.

original: yul gyi rnam pa ni pha rol po la ma grub bo zhes pa des na tshul gnyis nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa ni pha rol po la ma grub bo zhes pa des na tshul gnyis nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The aspect of the object is not established for the opponent. Therefore, the two modes must be proven.

original: yul la ni zhes pa ste /
analyzed: yul la ni zhes pa ste /
translated: “With regard to the object” means

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par 'dzin pa la ste /
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par 'dzin pa la ste /
translated: the word “only” is for the sake of exclusion.

original: rim pa tha dad pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rim pa tha dad pa yang ngo //
translated: The different stages are also.

original: de don dang rang snang ba'o zhes pa 'di ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: de don dang rang snang ba'o zhes pa 'di ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu ste /
translated: “The appearance of the object and itself” is the result of valid knowledge.

original: de la don snang ba ni yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la don snang ba ni yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Among them, the appearance of the object is the aspect of the object itself.

original: rang snang ba ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rang snang ba ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The appearance of itself is the aspect of the experience itself.

original: yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa'i snang ba zhes pa /
analyzed: yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa'i snang ba zhes pa /
translated: The appearance of consciousness that is in accordance with the object is

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa ni yul gyi shes pa kho na yin la de snang ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa ni yul gyi shes pa kho na yin la de snang ba ste /
translated: The consciousness that conforms to the object, form, etc. is the consciousness of the object.

original: yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa'i rnam pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa'i rnam pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: That is the appearance, i.e., the aspect of the consciousness of the object, which has the aspect of the object.

original: 'dis yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa rang gi shes pas dmigs so zhes pa gtan tshigs 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa rang gi shes pas dmigs so zhes pa gtan tshigs 'di gsungs so //
translated: This is the reason: “The consciousness of the object, which has the aspect of the object, is perceived by the consciousness of that.”

original: shes pa gang la dngos po gang rnam pa gang gis snang ba de rnams pa de kho nar des dmigs so zhes pa 'di ni rigs so //🔽de ltar ni lkog shal la sogs pa'i rnam pas /
analyzed: shes pa gang la dngos po gang rnam pa gang gis snang ba de rnams pa de kho nar des dmigs so zhes pa 'di ni rigs so // de ltar ni lkog shal la sogs pa'i rnam pas /
translated: It is reasonable to say that whatever object appears in whatever consciousness in whatever aspect is perceived in just that aspect by that consciousness.

original: ba lang ni rang gi shes pa la snang bzhin pa de'i rnam pa kho nar des dmigs so //
analyzed: ba lang ni rang gi shes pa la snang bzhin pa de'i rnam pa kho nar des dmigs so //
translated: In this way, the cow is perceived in its own consciousness in just that aspect in which it appears in that consciousness, by virtue of the aspect of the dewlap, etc.

original: yul shes pa'i shes pa la yang yul gyi rnam pa rjes su 'brel pa'i yul gyi shes pa'i rnam pa nye bar dmigs te /
analyzed: yul shes pa'i shes pa la yang yul gyi rnam pa rjes su 'brel pa'i yul gyi shes pa'i rnam pa nye bar dmigs te /
translated: And the consciousness of the object is perceived in the consciousness of that, by virtue of the aspect of the consciousness of the object, which is connected with the aspect of the object.

original: de dang bral ba ni rnam pa gzhan cung zad kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang bral ba ni rnam pa gzhan cung zad kyang ma yin no //
translated: It is not at all devoid of that aspect.

original: snang ba ma yin pa de'i yul du rigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: snang ba ma yin pa de'i yul du rigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable for that which is not an appearance to be the object of that.

original: ha cang thal pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would be absurd.

original: de'i phyir yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa rang gi shes pas dmigs so zhes pas gtan tshigs kyi don 'di 'thob bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa rang gi shes pas dmigs so zhes pas gtan tshigs kyi don 'di 'thob bo //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the reason is established by “The object of the consciousness that has the aspect of the object is observed by itself.”

original: rang snang ba'o zhes pa yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa'i snang bar gyur pa ni rang gi ngo bo yang so sor snang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang snang ba'o zhes pa yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa'i snang bar gyur pa ni rang gi ngo bo yang so sor snang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: “It is self-illuminating” means that the object of the consciousness that has the aspect of the object is self-illuminating, and the meaning is that its own nature is also individually illuminated.

original: rnam pa gzhan dun zhes pa tshul gnyis pa nyid med na ste gal te yul gyi rjes su mthun pa kho na yul gyi shes par 'gyur ro zhes pa yin na nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo 'ang ma yin no /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan dun zhes pa tshul gnyis pa nyid med na ste gal te yul gyi rjes su mthun pa kho na yul gyi shes par 'gyur ro zhes pa yin na nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo 'ang ma yin no /
translated: “Otherwise” means that if there is not a second mode, if the consciousness of the object were only in accordance with the object, then it would not be the nature of experience.

original: 'o na yul gcig bu'i ngo bo'i shes pa 'dod pa 'ga' yang med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na yul gcig bu'i ngo bo'i shes pa 'dod pa 'ga' yang med pa ma yin nam /
translated: “Well, then, is there not at least one who asserts a consciousness that has the nature of only the object?”

original: de ci'i don du 'di brjod ce na yul @36b gyi rnam pa can du shes pa bsgrub par bya ba na kha cig dogs pa 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ci'i don du 'di brjod ce na yul @36b gyi rnam pa can du shes pa bsgrub par bya ba na kha cig dogs pa 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: What is the point of this? When proving that consciousness has the aspect of the object, some may have this qualm:

original: yul gyi rnam pa can du gal te shes pa bsgrub par bya na rang gi ngo bo yongs su bor bas bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa can du gal te shes pa bsgrub par bya na rang gi ngo bo yongs su bor bas bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ste /
translated: “If consciousness is to be proven to have the aspect of the object, it must be proven by relinquishing its own nature.”

original: de'i phyir de bsal ba'i don du /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bsal ba'i don du /
translated: Therefore, in order to dispel that qualm,

original: rang gi ngo bo ma btang ba kho nar de yul gyi rnam pa'i rjes su byed do zhes bstan pa'i don du 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ma btang ba kho nar de yul gyi rnam pa'i rjes su byed do zhes bstan pa'i don du 'di gsungs so //
translated: in order to demonstrate that it follows the aspect of the object while not relinquishing its own nature, this verse was stated.

original: yang na rang gi ngo bo zhes pa /
analyzed: yang na rang gi ngo bo zhes pa /
translated: Or, “own nature”

original: yang na nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa kho na ste /
analyzed: yang na nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa kho na ste /
translated: means only the aspect of experience.

original: yul gyi rnam pa can yang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa can yang ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the aspect of the object.

original: shes pa'i shes pa yang yul shes pas khyad par du ma byas par 'gyur ro zhes pa /
analyzed: shes pa'i shes pa yang yul shes pas khyad par du ma byas par 'gyur ro zhes pa /
translated: “The consciousness of consciousness would not be distinguished by the object of consciousness.”

original: shes pa'i shes pa ni yul shes pa la dmigs pa'i shes pa ste /
analyzed: shes pa'i shes pa ni yul shes pa la dmigs pa'i shes pa ste /
translated: The consciousness of consciousness is the consciousness that observes the consciousness of the object.

original: de yul gyi shes pas khyad par du ma byas pa ste khyad par du byas pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yul gyi shes pas khyad par du ma byas pa ste khyad par du byas pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would not be distinguished by the consciousness of the object, that is, it would not be distinguished.

original: yul gyi rjes su byed pa dang 'brel pa'i yul gyi shes pa'i rnam pa nyid kyi khyad par gyis khyad par du byas par skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: yul gyi rjes su byed pa dang 'brel pa'i yul gyi shes pa'i rnam pa nyid kyi khyad par gyis khyad par du byas par skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It would not arise distinguished by the aspect of the consciousness of the object, which is related to the object that is to be distinguished.

original: gal te dmigs pas ni bdag gi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i rang gi shes pa skyed par byed ces pa 'di yod na /
analyzed: gal te dmigs pas ni bdag gi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i rang gi shes pa skyed par byed ces pa 'di yod na /
translated: If it is the case that the object generates its own consciousness, which possesses the aspect of the object’s own nature,

original: de'i tshe yul gyi shes pa las skye bzhin pa'i shes pa'i skad bshad pa'i rnam pas khyad par du byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yul gyi shes pa las skye bzhin pa'i shes pa'i skad bshad pa'i rnam pas khyad par du byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time the consciousness that is in the process of arising would be distinguished by the aspect of the object’s consciousness that is explained.

original: 'di med na ni ji ltar yul gyis rang gi shes pa khyad par du mi byed de /
analyzed: 'di med na ni ji ltar yul gyis rang gi shes pa khyad par du mi byed de /
translated: If this is not the case, then how could the object not distinguish its own consciousness?

original: rang dang 'dra ba'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas par mi bskyed pa de bzhin du yul shes pas kyang rang gi shes pa khyad par du mi byed par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: rang dang 'dra ba'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas par mi bskyed pa de bzhin du yul shes pas kyang rang gi shes pa khyad par du mi byed par 'gyur ba las /
translated: Just as it does not generate a consciousness that is distinguished by an aspect that is similar to itself, in the same way, the object’s consciousness would not distinguish its own consciousness.

original: khyad par du byed pa yang yin no //
analyzed: khyad par du byed pa yang yin no //
translated: It is also a qualifier.

original: de'i phyir yul gyi shes pa la yang yul gyi rnam pa yod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul gyi shes pa la yang yul gyi rnam pa yod do //
translated: Therefore, the consciousness of an object also has the form of the object.

original: gang zhig gang gi rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs pa de de'i rnam pa can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs pa de de'i rnam pa can du 'gyur te /
translated: That which is perceived by its own cognition as having the form of something is said to have the form of that thing.

original: dper na lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs pa'i ba lang ni lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rnam pa can yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs pa'i ba lang ni lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rnam pa can yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, a cow is said to have the form of a dewlap, etc., because it is perceived by its own cognition as having the form of a dewlap, etc.

original: yul gyi shes pa yang yul gyi rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs so//
analyzed: yul gyi shes pa yang yul gyi rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs so//
translated: The consciousness of an object is perceived by its own cognition as having the form of the object.

original: de'i rnam pa can du 'di dmigs so zhes par gzhag pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can du 'di dmigs so zhes par gzhag pa 'di ni /
translated: This determination that it is perceived as having the form of that is

original: de'i rnam pa can gyi rgyu can nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can gyi rgyu can nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because it has the form of that as its cause.

original: de bsgrub par bya ba la 'di 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de bsgrub par bya ba la 'di 'bras bu'o //
translated: That is its effect in establishing that.

original: de'i rnam pa nyid la ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa nyid la ni rang bzhin no //
translated: The form of that is its nature.

original: yul nyams su myong ba'i shes pa yang 'dir mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: yul nyams su myong ba'i shes pa yang 'dir mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: The consciousness of the experience of an object is merely an illustration here.

original: dpyod pa'i shes pa yang je ltar bsams @37a * //
analyzed: dpyod pa'i shes pa yang je ltar bsams @37a * //
translated: How does the consciousness that analyzes the ultimate apprehend its object?

original: pa'i don gyi rnam pa can dang shes pa'i rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs so //
analyzed: pa'i don gyi rnam pa can dang shes pa'i rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs so //
translated: Also, the consciousness that analyzes it observes the aspect of the object and the aspect of consciousness.

original: de ltar ni ji ltar yul shes pa'i shes pas ni yul nyams su myong ba'i shes pas don gyi tshul nyid dam nyams su myong ba'i tshul nyid 'ba' zhig la rtogs par byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni ji ltar yul shes pa'i shes pas ni yul nyams su myong ba'i shes pas don gyi tshul nyid dam nyams su myong ba'i tshul nyid 'ba' zhig la rtogs par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The consciousness that perceives an object does not merely realize the mode of being of the object or the mode of being of the experience.

original: 'on kyang 'di 'dra ba'i don dang de'i shes par gyur to zhes gnyis ka'i rnam par 'dzin pa de ltar don gyi rnam pa 'di 'dra ba sems par gyur to zhes rang gi shes pas gzung bar bya bas so //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di 'dra ba'i don dang de'i shes par gyur to zhes gnyis ka'i rnam par 'dzin pa de ltar don gyi rnam pa 'di 'dra ba sems par gyur to zhes rang gi shes pas gzung bar bya bas so //
translated: However, it apprehends both the object and the consciousness of that object in the aspect of “I have seen such an object and such a consciousness.”🔽In the same way, the consciousness that perceives the object apprehends the aspect of the object in the aspect of “I have thought of such an aspect of the object.”

original: de ltar 'gyur mod rnam pa med pa kho nar yul gyi shes pa skye ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod rnam pa med pa kho nar yul gyi shes pa skye ste /
translated: This is so, but the consciousness of an object arises only without aspects.

original: de la ni don gyi 'bras bu nyid kyis shes pa 'di don gyi 'bras bu'o zhes dran pa 'dir 'gyur la /
analyzed: de la ni don gyi 'bras bu nyid kyis shes pa 'di don gyi 'bras bu'o zhes dran pa 'dir 'gyur la /
translated: In that case, the memory “This consciousness is the result of the object” arises due to the result of the object.

original: de yod na nyams su myong ba'i shes pa'i rgyu don yang dran zhing /
analyzed: de yod na nyams su myong ba'i shes pa'i rgyu don yang dran zhing /
translated: If it exists, then the object that is the cause of the experience of consciousness is remembered.

original: de las phyis 'khrul pas nyams su myong ba'i shes pa don dang sbyar nas don gyi rnam pa nyid du lhag par zhen no //
analyzed: de las phyis 'khrul pas nyams su myong ba'i shes pa don dang sbyar nas don gyi rnam pa nyid du lhag par zhen no //
translated: From that, later on, due to delusion, the consciousness that experiences the object is applied to the object, and one is attached to the aspect of the object itself.

original: 'khrul pa ji tsam gyi 'bras bu rtogs pa pos de de ltar zhen pa de tsam gyi de de'i rnam pa can kho nar 'gyur ba rigs ba yang ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'khrul pa ji tsam gyi 'bras bu rtogs pa pos de de ltar zhen pa de tsam gyi de de'i rnam pa can kho nar 'gyur ba rigs ba yang ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is not logical that the result of delusion, to the extent that the cognizer is attached to it in that way, would be only the aspect of that.🔽To respond to that, it is said:

original: phyi ma phyi ma rnams kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: phyi ma phyi ma rnams kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The later and later are also...

original: kyang yig ni nges par 'dzin pa la'o //🔽phyi ma phyi ma ste yul shes pa'i shes pa la sogs pa de rnams ni /
analyzed: kyang yig ni nges par 'dzin pa la'o // phyi ma phyi ma ste yul shes pa'i shes pa la sogs pa de rnams ni /
translated: The word also is for the purpose of ascertaining.🔽The later and later, such as the consciousness of the object, are

original: snga ma ste nyams su myong ba'i shes pa'i yul gang yin pa ni phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa la ltos nas shes pas bar chod pa'i phyir ring ba yin zhes de snang ba can rnams su mi 'gyur ba kho na ste /
analyzed: snga ma ste nyams su myong ba'i shes pa'i yul gang yin pa ni phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa la ltos nas shes pas bar chod pa'i phyir ring ba yin zhes de snang ba can rnams su mi 'gyur ba kho na ste /
translated: the objects of the earlier, the consciousness of experience. From the perspective of the later and later consciousness, they are distant because they are interrupted by consciousness. Therefore they do not appear to those.

original: thob pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: thob pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are not obtained.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de ni yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not objects.

original: de ni ste ji skad bshad pa'i don ni phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ste ji skad bshad pa'i don ni phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of that is that they are not objects of subsequent consciousnesses.

original: gal te don de rnams kyi yang yul du gyur na de'i tshe de las skyes pa de rnams la /
analyzed: gal te don de rnams kyi yang yul du gyur na de'i tshe de las skyes pa de rnams la /
translated: If those objects were objects of those consciousnesses, then those consciousnesses would arise from them.

original: shes pa 'di rnams don gyi 'bras bu rnams so zhes don gyi 'bras bu nyid du dran pa 'di 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: shes pa 'di rnams don gyi 'bras bu rnams so zhes don gyi 'bras bu nyid du dran pa 'di 'gyur zhing /
translated: Then, remembering that these consciousnesses are the effects of objects, they would be the effects of objects.

original: de las de rnams kyi yang rgyu don de dran par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de las de rnams kyi yang rgyu don de dran par 'gyur la /
translated: And from them, remembering the object that is their cause,

original: de las kyang don de dang bsres nas der snang ba nyid du 'khrul pas rtogs pa pos 'dzin par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de las kyang don de dang bsres nas der snang ba nyid du 'khrul pas rtogs pa pos 'dzin par 'gyur na /
translated: and mixing that with them, the cognizer would apprehend them as being appearances of that.

original: 'di ni de rnams kyi yul yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni de rnams kyi yul yang ma yin gyi /
translated: But they are not objects of those.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: shes pa dang po kho na'i'o //
analyzed: shes pa dang po kho na'i'o //
translated: They are objects of the first consciousness alone.

original: de'i phyir don gyi nus pa las byung ba de kho na don dang yang dag par sbyar nas de'i rnam pa can nyid du 'dzin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyi nus pa las byung ba de kho na don dang yang dag par sbyar nas de'i rnam pa can nyid du 'dzin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the cognition that arises from the potency of the object is only connected with the object, and it is only apprehended as having the aspect of that object.

original: phyi ma @37b phyi ma rnams ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi ma @37b phyi ma rnams ma yin te /
translated: It is not the subsequent cognitions,

original: de rnams kyi de yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi de yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because those are not the object of the former.

original: de rnams kyang don gyi rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid du gzung ba yang yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyang don gyi rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid du gzung ba yang yin no //
translated: And those are also apprehended as conforming to the aspect of the object.

original: de ltar ni phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa ni rnam pa re res lhag par nye bar dmigs te /🔽bum pa'i shes pa'i shes par bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa dmigs pa na /
analyzed: de ltar ni phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa ni rnam pa re res lhag par nye bar dmigs te / bum pa'i shes pa'i shes par bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa dmigs pa na /
translated: In this way, the subsequent cognitions are observed to have an additional aspect each.🔽When the cognition of the cognition of the pot, which has the aspect of the pot, is observed,

original: bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes par gyur to zhes bum pa'i rnam pa dang lhan cig tu rtogs so //
analyzed: bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes par gyur to zhes bum pa'i rnam pa dang lhan cig tu rtogs so //
translated: it is understood together with the aspect of the pot, as “the cognition that has the aspect of the pot has occurred.”

original: de'i shes pas ni bum pa'i shes pa'i shes pa la dmigs bzhin pa'i bum pa'i shes pa'i shes par gyur to zhes bum pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa dang lhan cig pa'i bum pa'i shes pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i shes pas ni bum pa'i shes pa'i shes pa la dmigs bzhin pa'i bum pa'i shes pa'i shes par gyur to zhes bum pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa dang lhan cig pa'i bum pa'i shes pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: The consciousness of that consciousness of the pot is the consciousness of the consciousness of the pot that is observing the consciousness of the pot. Thus, the consciousness of the pot is the consciousness of the consciousness of the pot that is concomitant with the aspect of the consciousness of the pot.

original: de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang rig par bya'o //
translated: The same should be understood for the subsequent moments.

original: de ltar phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa snga ma ring por gyur pa'i don gyi rnam pa can rnams 'dzin te /
analyzed: de ltar phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa snga ma ring por gyur pa'i don gyi rnam pa can rnams 'dzin te /
translated: In this way, the subsequent moments of consciousness apprehend the aspects of objects that are distant in the past.

original: de rnams kyi rang gi yul yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang gi yul yang ma yin no //
translated: They are not the objects themselves.

original: gang gi phyir khyod kyis brjod pa'i tshul gyis de ltar 'dzin pa de'i phyir de rnams rang bzhin kho nas de'i rnam pa can rnams su 'gyur ro zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyod kyis brjod pa'i tshul gyis de ltar 'dzin pa de'i phyir de rnams rang bzhin kho nas de'i rnam pa can rnams su 'gyur ro zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Since they are apprehended in this way, as you have described, you must accept that they are by nature the aspects of those objects.

original: shes pa dang po yul gyi rnam pas stong pa nyid na ring por gyur pa'i don snga ma snang ba rnams su mi 'gyur te sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: shes pa dang po yul gyi rnam pas stong pa nyid na ring por gyur pa'i don snga ma snang ba rnams su mi 'gyur te sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: If the first moment of consciousness is empty of the aspect of the object, then it would not appear as the distant, prior object, as was explained earlier.

original: de'i phyir de yang don gyi snang ba can nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang don gyi snang ba can nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be accepted that it also has the appearance of an object.

original: de'i phyir yang tshul gnyis nyid du grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang tshul gnyis nyid du grub po //
translated: Therefore, the two modes are established.

original: gal te gang las de'i dbang gis yul gyi shes pa'i yul dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba yul gyi shes pa la shes pa gang yin pa de ni yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang rang gi snang ba can no zhes pa 'di kho na
analyzed: gal te gang las de'i dbang gis yul gyi shes pa'i yul dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba yul gyi shes pa la shes pa gang yin pa de ni yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang rang gi snang ba can no zhes pa 'di kho na
translated: If it is the case that the cognition of an object, by the power of which there is the appearance of an object, is the cognition of an object, then that is the appearance of the cognition that is in accord with the object and the appearance of itself.

original: ci las she na gang gi phyir de'i yul gyi shes pa dang 'brel pa can de'i sgo nas 'ongs pa yul gyi rnam pa dang nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa dag dang / gsum pa rang snang ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam pa zhes pa gsum po 'di rnams rang gi shes pas dmigs so //
analyzed: ci las she na gang gi phyir de'i yul gyi shes pa dang 'brel pa can de'i sgo nas 'ongs pa yul gyi rnam pa dang nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa dag dang / gsum pa rang snang ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam pa zhes pa gsum po 'di rnams rang gi shes pas dmigs so //
translated: Why is that? Because the cognition of the object is related to it, and it arises from it, and the aspect of the object and the aspect of the experience, and the third aspect, which has the characteristic of the appearance of itself, these three are observed by the cognition.

original: 'di yang phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa rnam pa re res lhag par dmigs so zhes pa 'dis da lta kho na bshad pa de ci'i rgyus brjed /
analyzed: 'di yang phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa rnam pa re res lhag par dmigs so zhes pa 'dis da lta kho na bshad pa de ci'i rgyus brjed /
translated: Also, this is explained by the statement, “The later consciousnesses focus on each aspect in excess,” so why do you forget that?

original: de'i phyir der yang yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i phyir der yang yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, in that case, in order to prove that the aspect of consciousness is in accordance with the object,🔽the proof statement “That which is observed by consciousness as having an aspect of that . . .”

original: gang zhig gang gi rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs pa de zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgrub byed rnam par shes pa'o //🔽'on de ltar @38a * //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rnam pa can du rang gi shes pas dmigs pa de zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgrub byed rnam par shes pa'o // 'on de ltar @38a * //
translated: proves consciousness.

original: de'i shes pa la sogs pa rnams la yang sgrub par byed ba brjod par bya'o zhes pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i shes pa la sogs pa rnams la yang sgrub par byed ba brjod par bya'o zhes pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But in that case, the proof statement should be stated for consciousness and so on, and so on, and so there would be an infinite regress.

original: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not the case.

original: gang gi phyir shes pa gang gi yul nye bar gyur pa de la the tshom skye ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa gang gi yul nye bar gyur pa de la the tshom skye ste /
translated: Because when the object of a consciousness is present, doubt arises.

original: ci sngon po'i rnam pa 'di yul gyi yin zhing shes pa ni rnam pa med ba yin nam /
analyzed: ci sngon po'i rnam pa 'di yul gyi yin zhing shes pa ni rnam pa med ba yin nam /
translated: Is this aspect of blue that of the object, and is consciousness without aspect?

original: 'on te shes pa'i yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te shes pa'i yin zhes pa'o //
translated: Or is it that of consciousness?

original: shes pa gang zhig g-yul ring bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni med do zhes pas nges par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: shes pa gang zhig g-yul ring bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni med do zhes pas nges par gyur pa ste /
translated: When consciousness is far removed from the object, then it is certain that it does not exist.

original: de'i yul gyi rnam pa'i ngor the tshom du 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pas thug pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i yul gyi rnam pa'i ngor the tshom du 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pas thug pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that there is an infinite regress, since the object does not become doubtful in the aspect of the object of that consciousness.

original: dus phyis dran pa las kyang ste //
analyzed: dus phyis dran pa las kyang ste //
translated: And also from memory at a later time.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: And so on.

original: sngar ni yul gyi shes pa gcig gi yul dang 'dra ba nyid kyi khyad par gyis tshul gnyis pa nyid du bsgrubs la /
analyzed: sngar ni yul gyi shes pa gcig gi yul dang 'dra ba nyid kyi khyad par gyis tshul gnyis pa nyid du bsgrubs la /
translated: Previously, the dualistic mode of consciousness was established by the fact that the object of a single consciousness is similar to the object.

original: da ni shes pa rnams kyi phan tshun tha dad par dran pa las bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni shes pa rnams kyi phan tshun tha dad par dran pa las bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Now, it will be established from the mutual difference of the memories of the consciousnesses.

original: gang phyir ji ltar phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gzugs la sogs pa nyams su myong ba rnams la phan tshun tha dad par dran par 'gyur ba de ltar shes pa rnams la yang ste de'i phyir shes pa'i tshul gnyis pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: gang phyir ji ltar phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gzugs la sogs pa nyams su myong ba rnams la phan tshun tha dad par dran par 'gyur ba de ltar shes pa rnams la yang ste de'i phyir shes pa'i tshul gnyis pa nyid yod do //
translated: Because, just as mutually different forms, etc., which are experienced are remembered as mutually different, so also are the consciousnesses. Therefore, consciousness has a dual mode.

original: gzhan du na nyams su myong ba tsam du don so so la khyad par med par tha dad par myong ba med pa'i shes pa thams cad rnams la /🔽bdag la gzugs kyi shes par gyur gyi sgra'i shes pa ni ma yin no zhes pa 'am /
analyzed: gzhan du na nyams su myong ba tsam du don so so la khyad par med par tha dad par myong ba med pa'i shes pa thams cad rnams la / bdag la gzugs kyi shes par gyur gyi sgra'i shes pa ni ma yin no zhes pa 'am /
translated: Otherwise, if there were no difference in the experience of the object, then all consciousnesses that do not experience a difference would be🔽unable to remember a difference, such as, “I had a visual consciousness, but I did not have an auditory consciousness,”

original: sgra'i shes pa byung gi gzugs kyi shes pa ni ma yin no zhes gang 'di tha dad par dran pa de med par 'gyur ro //🔽de ltar 'gyur mod kyi ji ltar nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du mtshungs pa la /
analyzed: sgra'i shes pa byung gi gzugs kyi shes pa ni ma yin no zhes gang 'di tha dad par dran pa de med par 'gyur ro // de ltar 'gyur mod kyi ji ltar nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du mtshungs pa la /
translated: or, “An auditory consciousness arose, but a visual consciousness did not arise.”🔽Granted that this is so, but just as pleasure and so on are differentiated by the specific collection of causes,

original: tshogs pa'i bye brag las bde ba la sogs pa'i bye brag tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du yul so so la tshogs pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis byas pa'i khyad par phra mo yod de /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i bye brag las bde ba la sogs pa'i bye brag tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du yul so so la tshogs pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis byas pa'i khyad par phra mo yod de /
translated: so too there is a subtle difference in the specific collection of causes that produces each object.

original: de'i phyir tha dad par dran par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad par dran par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is possible to remember a difference.

original: de ni bden pa min te /
analyzed: de ni bden pa min te /
translated: That is not so, because

original: khyad par bsal ba dran pa'i rgyu yin pas so //
analyzed: khyad par bsal ba dran pa'i rgyu yin pas so //
translated: the cause of remembering a difference is the elimination of a difference.

original: de ltar ni btang snyoms kyi gnas su gyur pa'i yul 'ga' zhig la gang shes pa rgyun gyis 'byung ba de'i yang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs pa gzhan dang gzhan mod /
analyzed: de ltar ni btang snyoms kyi gnas su gyur pa'i yul 'ga' zhig la gang shes pa rgyun gyis 'byung ba de'i yang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs pa gzhan dang gzhan mod /
translated: Thus, when there is a continuum of consciousness in regard to some object that is the basis of equanimity, there is a succession of collections of faculties, etc.

original: de lta na yang ji skad blo'i skad cig 'di tsam rnams 'das so zhes pa ltar tha dad par dran pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang ji skad blo'i skad cig 'di tsam rnams 'das so zhes pa ltar tha dad par dran pa ma yin te /
translated: However, it is not like the memory of the past that remembers the specific moments of consciousness, thinking, “Just these many moments of consciousness have passed.”

original: dper na mtshe ma dag pa rnam pa dper mtshungs kyang dngos por tha dad pa yod pa de lta na'ang @38b mi gsal ba nyid kyi phyir de la tha dad par ngo shes par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dper na mtshe ma dag pa rnam pa dper mtshungs kyang dngos por tha dad pa yod pa de lta na'ang @38b mi gsal ba nyid kyi phyir de la tha dad par ngo shes par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: For example, although twins are similar in appearance, they are not recognized as different because of their indistinctness.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: If you ask, “What is it?”

original: de dag phan tshun sgro 'dogs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag phan tshun sgro 'dogs pa'o //
translated: It is mutual superimposition.

original: de'i phyir khyad par gsal ba med pa'i don la /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par gsal ba med pa'i don la /
translated: Therefore, in regard to an indistinct object,

original: tha dad pa can gyi dran pa 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa can gyi dran pa 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: there is no memory of a different object.

original: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba la don gyis byas pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig yod de /
analyzed: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba la don gyis byas pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig yod de /
translated: Therefore, there is some difference in the experience that is made by the object.

original: gang las tha dad par dran par 'gyur ba'o zhes pas dga' mgur don dang 'dra ba nyid 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang las tha dad par dran par 'gyur ba'o zhes pas dga' mgur don dang 'dra ba nyid 'dod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should desire the very thing that is like the object, which is the memory that is different from the object.

original: de'i phyir yang shes pa tshul gnyis par grub bo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang shes pa tshul gnyis par grub bo zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is established that consciousness has two modes.

original: rang rig bya nyid du yang ngo zhes pa 'dis ni de ma thag par bshad pa kho na'i 'thad pa'i bsgrub par bya ba gzhan gsungs te /
analyzed: rang rig bya nyid du yang ngo zhes pa 'dis ni de ma thag par bshad pa kho na'i 'thad pa'i bsgrub par bya ba gzhan gsungs te /
translated: Also, it is reflexive awareness itself. This line states another proof of what was just explained.

original: dus phyis dran pa las shes pa'i tshul gnyis pa nyid grub pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: dus phyis dran pa las shes pa'i tshul gnyis pa nyid grub pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is it established that consciousness has two modes from the memory that occurs later,

original: 'on kyang rang rig pa yang ste gang tshad ma'i 'bras bu nyid du 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang rig pa yang ste gang tshad ma'i 'bras bu nyid du 'dod pa'o //
translated: but also it is reflexive awareness, which is asserted to be the result of valid knowledge.

original: re zhig ces pa ni 'ba' zhig las nyams su myong ba yod de /
analyzed: re zhig ces pa ni 'ba' zhig las nyams su myong ba yod de /
translated: “At that time” means that there is an experience of only the object.

original: de'i phyir dran par yang 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de'i phyir dran par yang 'gyur mod /
translated: Therefore, memory does occur.

original: de tsam gyis ci'i phyir rang rig pa yin zhes bsams nas 'dri ba /
analyzed: de tsam gyis ci'i phyir rang rig pa yin zhes bsams nas 'dri ba /
translated: But why is it reflexive awareness? Thinking this, the opponent asks,

original: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa'o //
translated: “Why?”

original: bdag nyid kho nas shes pa nyams su myong bar rigs kyi gzhan gyis ma yin zhes nges par byas nas gsungs pa /🔽'di la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid kho nas shes pa nyams su myong bar rigs kyi gzhan gyis ma yin zhes nges par byas nas gsungs pa / 'di la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Having ascertained that it is proper that consciousness is experienced by itself alone and not by another, he says:🔽“Here, if there were experience of an object, then there would be memory of it, as in the case of form, etc.🔽But there is no experience of consciousness by another consciousness.🔽Therefore, there is no memory of consciousness.”

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /🔽gang la dran pa de la nyams su myong ba ste /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te / gang la dran pa de la nyams su myong ba ste /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The result is that memory of that which is experienced exists, just as memory of form, etc. exists.

original: gzugs la sogs pa bzhin dran pa yang yod do zhes pa 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa bzhin dran pa yang yod do zhes pa 'bras bu'o //
translated: Here, he says “If there were experience of an object,” etc.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod ces pa la sogs pas shes pa gzhan gyis nyams su myong bar mngon par 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod ces pa la sogs pas shes pa gzhan gyis nyams su myong bar mngon par 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: This clearly shows the opponent’s belief that consciousness is experienced by another consciousness.

original: de'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa nyid do zhes pha rol gyi bsam pa gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa nyid do zhes pha rol gyi bsam pa gsal bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, it is just an argument that proves what has already been established.

original: shes pa gzhan gyis zhes pa la sogs pas grub pa la sgrub pa nyid yongs su spong ste /
analyzed: shes pa gzhan gyis zhes pa la sogs pas grub pa la sgrub pa nyid yongs su spong ste /
translated: He completely rejects the argument that proves what has already been established by “Consciousness of that,” etc.

original: shes pa gang gis shes pa nyams su myong ba de la yang dus phyis dran pa mthong la /
analyzed: shes pa gang gis shes pa nyams su myong ba de la yang dus phyis dran pa mthong la /
translated: He sees that memory of that consciousness by which consciousness is experienced exists at a later time.

original: nyams su myong ba la yin pa la dran pa'i rigs pa yang ma yin no zhes de'i phyir de la dmigs pa'i shes pa gzhan 'byung bar bya zhing /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba la yin pa la dran pa'i rigs pa yang ma yin no zhes de'i phyir de la dmigs pa'i shes pa gzhan 'byung bar bya zhing /
translated: It is not reasonable to remember what was experienced by another consciousness.

original: de la yang dran pa ste /🔽de las de la yang gzhan gyis zhes pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: de la yang dran pa ste / de las de la yang gzhan gyis zhes pa de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the arising of another consciousness that observes that is memory.🔽And in that case, another consciousness would observe that.

original: shes pa gzhan gyis nyams su myong ba la shes pa rnams thug pa med pa ste /
analyzed: shes pa gzhan gyis nyams su myong ba la shes pa rnams thug pa med pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the experience of consciousness by another consciousness is infinite.

original: shes pa gcig mngon par grub pa kho na na /🔽shes pa brgyud pa shes pa phyi ma phyi ma shes pa snga ma snga ma la dmigs pa mtha' yas pa @39a * //
analyzed: shes pa gcig mngon par grub pa kho na na / shes pa brgyud pa shes pa phyi ma phyi ma shes pa snga ma snga ma la dmigs pa mtha' yas pa @39a * //
translated: When only one consciousness is established,

original: rnams su thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnams su thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: an infinite number of consciousnesses, the later consciousnesses that are the continuums of the former consciousnesses, would be the objects of the former consciousnesses.🔽This is the meaning of the consequence.

original: de ltar gyur na skyon ci yod ce na gsungs pa /🔽yul gzhan la 'pho ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na skyon ci yod ce na gsungs pa / yul gzhan la 'pho ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If that were the case, what would be the fault? It is said:🔽If consciousness were to move to another object,🔽then the engagement of consciousness in another object would not exist.

original: yul gzhan la shes pa 'jug pa med par 'gyur na 'dod pa yang yin no //
analyzed: yul gzhan la shes pa 'jug pa med par 'gyur na 'dod pa yang yin no //
translated: And that is also asserted.

original: de la shes pa gang las 'pho ba de la rang rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la shes pa gang las 'pho ba de la rang rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the movement from one consciousness to another would be autocognition.

original: de ni 'gyur mod kyi shes pa tha ma ni shes pa gzhan gyis nyams su myong bar bya ba nyid dang dran par yang mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ni 'gyur mod kyi shes pa tha ma ni shes pa gzhan gyis nyams su myong bar bya ba nyid dang dran par yang mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: That is so, but the final consciousness is not experienced by another consciousness and it is not remembered.

original: gcig po de nyams su ma myong ba dang / ma dran pa kho nar gnas la de'i phyir yul gzhan la 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gcig po de nyams su ma myong ba dang / ma dran pa kho nar gnas la de'i phyir yul gzhan la 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: It alone remains without being experienced or remembered and therefore it transfers to another object.

original: 'di ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di ni mi rigs te /
translated: This is illogical.

original: de ltar ni gal te shes pa tha ma nyams su myong ba ma yin na /🔽de'i phyir snga ma'i dus su byung ba'i shes pa rnams thams cad nyams su myong ba med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar ni gal te shes pa tha ma nyams su myong ba ma yin na / de'i phyir snga ma'i dus su byung ba'i shes pa rnams thams cad nyams su myong ba med par 'gyur te /
translated: If the final consciousness is not experienced,

original: de'i dmigs byed lkog tu gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dmigs byed lkog tu gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: then all the consciousnesses that arose in the past would not be experienced because they would be hidden from the consciousness that experiences them.

original: gang zhig gi dmigs byed gang yin pa lkog tu gyur pa de de yis nyams su myong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gi dmigs byed gang yin pa lkog tu gyur pa de de yis nyams su myong ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is hidden from the consciousness that experiences it is not experienced by it,

original: dper na lhas byin gyis shes pa lhas byin gyis nyams su myong ba ni mchod byin gyis bzhin /
analyzed: dper na lhas byin gyis shes pa lhas byin gyis nyams su myong ba ni mchod byin gyis bzhin /
translated: just as Devadatta is not experienced by Yajñadatta.

original: srog chags rnams kyi bdag nyid dang 'brel pa'i sngon gyi dus su byung ba'i shes pa'i dmigs pa yang lkog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyi bdag nyid dang 'brel pa'i sngon gyi dus su byung ba'i shes pa'i dmigs pa yang lkog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The object of cognition that is related to the self of living beings is also hidden.

original: 'gal bas khyab ba'o //
analyzed: 'gal bas khyab ba'o //
translated: The pervasion is by contradiction.

original: yang na dmigs pa mngon sum ma yin pa de mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na dmigs pa mngon sum ma yin pa de mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: Or, the object of non-perception is not perception,

original: lkog gyur bzhin /
analyzed: lkog gyur bzhin /
translated: like the hidden.

original: dmigs pa nyams su ma myong ba'i shes pa yang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa nyams su ma myong ba'i shes pa yang de lta bu'o //
translated: The cognition that does not experience the object is also like that.

original: 'gal bas khyab pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal bas khyab pa'o //
translated: The pervasion is by contradiction.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: This is possible.

original: gang bdag nyid kyis nyams su myong ba'i shes pa de mngon sum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang bdag nyid kyis nyams su myong ba'i shes pa de mngon sum du 'gyur te /
translated: The cognition that experiences itself is perception.🔽Therefore, that which is experienced by others is not perception.

original: des na gzhan rnams kyis gang nyams su myong ba nge mngon sum ma yin pa'o zhe na 'o na bdag nyid nyams su myong ba de ci zhig las grub /
analyzed: des na gzhan rnams kyis gang nyams su myong ba nge mngon sum ma yin pa'o zhe na 'o na bdag nyid nyams su myong ba de ci zhig las grub /
translated: But how is that experience of itself established?

original: gal te nyams su myong ba grub pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te nyams su myong ba grub pa de'i tshe /
translated: If the experience is established,

original: bdag nyid la'am gzhan la zhes rnam par dbye bar 'gyur zhe na de ni ma grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid la'am gzhan la zhes rnam par dbye bar 'gyur zhe na de ni ma grub pa kho na'o //
translated: then it would be analyzed as “in oneself” or “in another.” But that is not established.

original: de ma grub pa na gnyis kar yang lkog tu gyur pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ma grub pa na gnyis kar yang lkog tu gyur pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since that is not established, there is no difference between the two in being hidden.

original: nyams su myong ba 'di ni bdag nyid la yin gyi gzhan la ma yin no zhes pa 'di lkog tu gyur pa'i dmigs pas shes par dka'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba 'di ni bdag nyid la yin gyi gzhan la ma yin no zhes pa 'di lkog tu gyur pa'i dmigs pas shes par dka'o //
translated: It is difficult to know that this experience is of oneself and not of another, since the object is hidden.

original: de'i phyir ci zhig las bdag nyid kyis nyams su myong ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir ci zhig las bdag nyid kyis nyams su myong ba yin /
translated: Therefore, from what is it experienced by oneself?

original: gal te gzung bya la dmigs pa ma grub na yang dngos po mngon sum du 'dod na 'gro @39b ba 'di thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gzung bya la dmigs pa ma grub na yang dngos po mngon sum du 'dod na 'gro @39b ba 'di thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur te /
translated: If the object of observation is not established, and you assert that things are direct perception, then all of these goers would be direct perception.

original: dmigs pa mngon sum ma yin pa nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: dmigs pa mngon sum ma yin pa nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir na /
translated: Since there is no difference in the object of observation not being direct perception,

original: 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: there is no going.

original: de'i phyir shes pa'i rang rig pa nyid du khas blang bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa'i rang rig pa nyid du khas blang bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be accepted that consciousness is reflexive awareness.

original: 'dir slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi rtsod pa sgrub pa'o zhes 'jig rten na rab tu grags pa 'di ni bstan bcos mdzad pas ni des mdzad pa'i bstan bcos gzhan rnams skyon med pa nyid la bltas nas /
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi rtsod pa sgrub pa'o zhes 'jig rten na rab tu grags pa 'di ni bstan bcos mdzad pas ni des mdzad pa'i bstan bcos gzhan rnams skyon med pa nyid la bltas nas /
translated: Here, the treatise master states that the treatise master Vasubandhu, who is well known in the world as the author of the Vadaanyayajnana, is not the same person who composed the Vadaanyayajnana that has faults.

original: skyon dang bcas pa'i rtsod pa sgrub pa des mdzad pa nyid mi srid do zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: skyon dang bcas pa'i rtsod pa sgrub pa des mdzad pa nyid mi srid do zhes gsungs pa /
translated: He states that it is impossible that the author of the Vadaanyayajnana that has faults is the same person who composed the other treatises that are faultless.🔽He says,

original: rtsod sgrub slob dpon gyi ma yin //
analyzed: rtsod sgrub slob dpon gyi ma yin //
translated: He is not the master of the Vadaanyayajnana.

original: zhes pa'o // 'on byed pa bo ma mthong ba'i bstan bcos rnams kyi bye pa po grags pa kho na las nges par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'on byed pa bo ma mthong ba'i bstan bcos rnams kyi bye pa po grags pa kho na las nges par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: But aren’t the authors of the treatises that are not seen by us to be ascertained only from their fame?🔽And in this case, it is said that he exists.

original: 'di la yang de yod de zhes pas ci ltar rtsod sgrub slob dpon gyis yin zhe na /🔽snying po med ces nges pa 'am //
analyzed: 'di la yang de yod de zhes pas ci ltar rtsod sgrub slob dpon gyis yin zhe na / snying po med ces nges pa 'am //
translated: How is he the master of the Vadaanyayajnana?

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: He says,🔽He is the one who is certain that it is without essence.

original: skabs nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis de la zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: skabs nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis de la zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Because of the context, the master should be understood to be the one who is certain that it is without essence.

original: 'dis ni 'di lta bu'i don gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di lta bu'i don gsal bar byed de /
translated: This clarifies the meaning in this way.

original: re zhig grags pa tsam gyis ni don nges par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: re zhig grags pa tsam gyis ni don nges par mi 'gyur te /
translated: For, at first, one does not ascertain the meaning just from the mere words.

original: don med par yang de srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med par yang de srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, it is possible that the words are meaningless.

original: gal te yang des de mdzad pa de lta na yang dang po shes rab phul du byung ba ma skyes par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: gal te yang des de mdzad pa de lta na yang dang po shes rab phul du byung ba ma skyes par gyur pa ste /
translated: And even if he did compose it, still, at first, the highest wisdom was not born in him.

original: phyis blo byang bar gyur pa na 'dis de la snying po med par nges pa skyes so zhes pa'o//
analyzed: phyis blo byang bar gyur pa na 'dis de la snying po med par nges pa skyes so zhes pa'o//
translated: But later, when his mind became mature, he did produce the certainty that it was worthless.

original: yang ji lta bur 'dis de la snying po med par nges pa 'di ci ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: yang ji lta bur 'dis de la snying po med par nges pa 'di ci ltar rtogs she na /
translated: And how did he produce the certainty that it was worthless?

original: gzhan du na cha shas smras phyir zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan du na cha shas smras phyir zhes pa ste /
translated: Because he stated a part of it elsewhere.

original: skyon med pa cha shas brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: skyon med pa cha shas brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because he stated a faultless part of it.

original: gang skyon bstan pa las ni slob dpon gyis rtsod pa sgrub pa la snying po med par nges pa las na rtsod pa sgrub par byed pa la gzhan du cha shas brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gang skyon bstan pa las ni slob dpon gyis rtsod pa sgrub pa la snying po med par nges pa las na rtsod pa sgrub par byed pa la gzhan du cha shas brjod pa'o //
translated: From the statement of the fault, the Master ascertained that the composition of the treatise was worthless. Therefore, he stated a part of it elsewhere, in the composition of the treatise.

original: skyon de rnams kho na kho bo cag gis rab tu gsal bar bya'o zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: skyon de rnams kho na kho bo cag gis rab tu gsal bar bya'o zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: We will make those faults very clear.

original: des na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: des na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, etc.

original: des na zhes pa'i skyon dang ldan pa nyid kyis na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes pa'i skyon dang ldan pa nyid kyis na'o //
translated: Thus, because of having those faults.

original: de ltar ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni /
translated: Thus,

original: gzhan du cha shas brjod pa las //
analyzed: gzhan du cha shas brjod pa las //
translated: in other words, from the expression of the parts.

original: zhes pa 'dis rtsod pa sgrub pa skyon dang ldan pa nyid du gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis rtsod pa sgrub pa skyon dang ldan pa nyid du gsal bar byas so //
translated: This makes clear that the proof of the opponent is faulty.

original: tshad ma la sogs pa rnams la zhes pa la /
analyzed: tshad ma la sogs pa rnams la zhes pa la /
translated: With regard to the valid cognitions, etc.,

original: tshad ma'i cha shas dang de ltar snang ba dang ltag chod dang de'i lan rnams la'o //
analyzed: tshad ma'i cha shas dang de ltar snang ba dang ltag chod dang de'i lan rnams la'o //
translated: the parts of the valid cognitions, the appearances, the sophistries, and the replies to them.

original: don de las rnam par shes pa mngon sum zhes pa /
analyzed: don de las rnam par shes pa mngon sum zhes pa /
translated: Consciousness from that object is direct perception.

original: yul gang gis rnam par shes pa tha snyad bya ba de kho na las gang @40a * //
analyzed: yul gang gis rnam par shes pa tha snyad bya ba de kho na las gang @40a * //
translated: That consciousness is direct perception which arises from just that object which is the basis of the designation of consciousness,

original: te de skye zhing gzhan las ma yin la / de las gzhan las kyang ma yin pa'i shes pa de mngon sum ste /
analyzed: te de skye zhing gzhan las ma yin la / de las gzhan las kyang ma yin pa'i shes pa de mngon sum ste /
translated: and not from another, and not from that and another.

original: dper na gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa dang bde ba la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dper na gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa dang bde ba la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin zhes pa'o //
translated: For example, like the consciousness of form, etc., and the consciousness of pleasure, etc.

original: 'dis ni 'khrul pa'i shes pa bsal te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'khrul pa'i shes pa bsal te /
translated: This refutes the consciousness that is mistaken.

original: dper na nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, like the consciousness of silver in a shell.

original: de ni dngul gyis dngul gyi shes pa'o zhes tha snyad byed la de dngul las skye ba yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni dngul gyis dngul gyi shes pa'o zhes tha snyad byed la de dngul las skye ba yang ma yin gyi /
translated: That is called the consciousness of silver in silver, and that is not produced from silver.

original: nya phyis kho nas de bskyed par bya ba'o //
analyzed: nya phyis kho nas de bskyed par bya ba'o //
translated: It is produced only from the shell.

original: kun rdzob pa'i shes pa yang 'dis gsal te /
analyzed: kun rdzob pa'i shes pa yang 'dis gsal te /
translated: This also clarifies the conventional consciousness.

original: de ltar ni bum pa'i shes pa bum pa'i shes pa zhes pa 'di ltar de bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyis tha snyad bya zhing /
analyzed: de ltar ni bum pa'i shes pa bum pa'i shes pa zhes pa 'di ltar de bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyis tha snyad bya zhing /
translated: In this way, the consciousness of a pot is called the consciousness of a pot. In this way, it is designated by those pots, etc.

original: de de rnams las 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de de rnams las 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not produced from them.

original: de rnams ni kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid kyis rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams ni kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid kyis rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not causes, since they exist only conventionally.

original: gzugs la sogs pa de ltar yang dag par zhen pa rnams kho na las de 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa de ltar yang dag par zhen pa rnams kho na las de 'byung ngo //
translated: It arises only from those forms, etc., which are correctly conceived.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa yang 'di kho nas bsal te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa yang 'di kho nas bsal te /
translated: The cognition of inference is also refuted by this alone.

original: du ba'i shes pa dang 'brel ba dran pa dag las kyang de byung gi me kho na las ma yin pas so //
analyzed: du ba'i shes pa dang 'brel ba dran pa dag las kyang de byung gi me kho na las ma yin pas so //
translated: From the memory that is related to the cognition of smoke, it is only fire that occurs, not the cognition of smoke.

original: de las 'byung ba kho na ste /
analyzed: de las 'byung ba kho na ste /
translated: It is only from that that it occurs.

original: mi 'byung ba ni ma yin no zhes pa 'di yang 'dir don du mngon par 'dod do //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba ni ma yin no zhes pa 'di yang 'dir don du mngon par 'dod do //
translated: It is not that it does not occur. This is also what is intended here.

original: de de ltar rnam par gzhag pa la /
analyzed: de de ltar rnam par gzhag pa la /
translated: In this way, it is presented.

original: 'di brgal zhing brtag bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di brgal zhing brtag bar bya ste /
translated: This should be investigated and analyzed:

original: ci 'di rkyen la ltos pa'i nges ba nyid dam /
analyzed: ci 'di rkyen la ltos pa'i nges ba nyid dam /
translated: Is this certainty dependent on conditions,

original: 'on te dmigs pa la ltos pa yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te dmigs pa la ltos pa yin zhes pa'o //
translated: or is it dependent on the object?

original: de las ci zhe na /
analyzed: de las ci zhe na /
translated: What is the point of that?

original: gnyi ga'i gnas la yang skyon te /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i gnas la yang skyon te /
translated: There is a fault in both cases.

original: re zhig nges pa snga ma'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
analyzed: re zhig nges pa snga ma'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
translated: First, from the perspective of the former certainty, it is said:

original: don de las zhes kun gyin na //
analyzed: don de las zhes kun gyin na //
translated: If it is from that object,

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: then it is not ascertained.

original: gal te de las zhes pa la sogs pa 'di kho na'i rnam par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gal te de las zhes pa la sogs pa 'di kho na'i rnam par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of “from that” and so on.

original: 'o na rnam bar shes pa tha snyad du byed pa'i rgyu yul ni skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'o na rnam bar shes pa tha snyad du byed pa'i rgyu yul ni skabs yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: But since the object is the cause of consciousness conventionally,🔽it is the object that is emphasized by the phrase “from that.”

original: de las zhes pa 'dis skabs kyis nye bas de kho na lhur len no zhes pas 'di the tshom med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de las zhes pa 'dis skabs kyis nye bas de kho na lhur len no zhes pas 'di the tshom med pa ma yin nam /
translated: So isn’t it certain that this is what is being referred to?

original: des na ci las dogs pa 'di yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na ci las dogs pa 'di yin zhe na /
translated: What is the doubt that this passage is trying to dispel?

original: gal te de las zhes pa 'dis rkyen rnam pa bzhi ngo ;
analyzed: gal te de las zhes pa 'dis rkyen rnam pa bzhi ngo ;
translated: The phrase “from that” refers to the four conditions.

original: thams cad kyang brjod par bya zhes pa'i don gang 'di ni 'dir khyod kyis yongs su brtags pa ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyang brjod par bya zhes pa'i don gang 'di ni 'dir khyod kyis yongs su brtags pa ma yin te /
translated: The phrase “all should be expressed” does not mean that you should imagine that all are expressed by the word “all.”

original: gang phyir 'dir chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa'i rkyen kho na kun gyi sgras brjod do //
analyzed: gang phyir 'dir chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa'i rkyen kho na kun gyi sgras brjod do //
translated: Here, the word “all” refers only to the objective condition because it is the nature of all phenomena.

original: yang ci ltar da chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin zhe na /🔽dmigs pa chos rnams @40b thams cad do //
analyzed: yang ci ltar da chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin zhe na / dmigs pa chos rnams @40b thams cad do //
translated: How is it the nature of all phenomena?

original: zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the characteristic of being the object of all phenomena.

original: gzhan chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par shes pa'i rkyen tha snyad du bstan pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de las zhes pa 'dis brjod par bya ba yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par shes pa'i rkyen tha snyad du bstan pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de las zhes pa 'dis brjod par bya ba yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But other than that, the nature of all phenomena is not expressed by the condition of consciousness, which is taught conventionally.

original: de'i phyir dmigs pa'i rkyen kho na kun gyi sgras bshad do zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs pa'i rkyen kho na kun gyi sgras bshad do zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that the term all refers only to the objective condition.

original: de las kyang don 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las kyang don 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of this is as follows:

original: gal te chos kun gyi rang bzhin can gyi rkyen brjod na ste /
analyzed: gal te chos kun gyi rang bzhin can gyi rkyen brjod na ste /
translated: If the condition that is the nature of all phenomena is expressed,

original: gal te dmigs pa'i rkyen brjod na zhes pa ji srid pa'o //
analyzed: gal te dmigs pa'i rkyen brjod na zhes pa ji srid pa'o //
translated: if the objective condition is expressed,

original: des na de brtsad par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de brtsad par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: then it is not to be disputed.

original: gang gis dmigs pa'i rkyen dang 'brel pa can nyid kyis shes pa bstan par bya ba de de kho na las byung ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gis dmigs pa'i rkyen dang 'brel pa can nyid kyis shes pa bstan par bya ba de de kho na las byung ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Since consciousness is taught to be related to the objective condition, it does not arise from that alone.

original: 'o na zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na zhe na /
translated: If that is so,

original: rkyen gzhan las kyang ste /🔽bzhi yis sems dang sems byung rnams //
analyzed: rkyen gzhan las kyang ste / bzhi yis sems dang sems byung rnams //
translated: it arises from other conditions.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said, “The mind and mental factors arise from four conditions.”

original: de ltar rkyen nges ba'i phyogs la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rkyen nges ba'i phyogs la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba gsal bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, the contradiction with the philosophical system in the case of the determination of the condition should be made clear.

original: dmigs pa nges pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa nges pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
translated: With reference to the determination of the object, it is said:

original: dmigs pa'o zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa'o zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If it is the object, etc.

original: 'di la mtshan nyid ha cang khyab pa nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di la mtshan nyid ha cang khyab pa nyid du gsungs so //
translated: Here, the characteristic is stated to be too wide.

original: yul tsam zhes pa 'dir gang de'i tshe nye bar gyur pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i gsal ba de rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa nyid kyis na yul gyi sgras brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yul tsam zhes pa 'dir gang de'i tshe nye bar gyur pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i gsal ba de rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa nyid kyis na yul gyi sgras brjod par bya'o //
translated: In this case, the manifestation of form, etc., which is present, is to be called the object by the word object because it is the object of consciousness.

original: tsam gyi sgra dmigs pa gzhan rnam par gcod par byed do //
analyzed: tsam gyi sgra dmigs pa gzhan rnam par gcod par byed do //
translated: The word “only” excludes other objects.

original: dran pa la sogs pa'i shes pa yang gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis tha snyad byed de /
analyzed: dran pa la sogs pa'i shes pa yang gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis tha snyad byed de /
translated: The cognition of memory, etc., is also designated by form, etc.

original: gzugs dran no //
analyzed: gzugs dran no //
translated: One remembers form.

original: skyur ba mngon par 'dod do //
analyzed: skyur ba mngon par 'dod do //
translated: One desires sour.

original: me rjes su dpag go zhes so //
analyzed: me rjes su dpag go zhes so //
translated: One infers fire.

original: dmigs pa gzhan la mi ltos pa yang ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa gzhan la mi ltos pa yang ste /
translated: It does not depend on another object.

original: de'i phyir de yang mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, that also would be perception.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod kyi rjes su dpag par bya ba'i yul can gyi shes pa ni me tsam las skye ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod kyi rjes su dpag par bya ba'i yul can gyi shes pa ni me tsam las skye ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, it is true, the cognition that is the object of inference does not arise from fire alone.

original: 'on kyang phyogs kyi chos nyid dang 'brel ba shes pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang phyogs kyi chos nyid dang 'brel ba shes pa las kyang ngo //
translated: However, it also arises from the cognition that is related to the property of the subject.

original: des na thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, why is this consequence?

original: me la sogs pa'i shes pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: me la sogs pa'i shes pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: He says, “The cognition of fire, etc.,” and so on.

original: gal te yang de don gzhan las kyang skye mod /
analyzed: gal te yang de don gzhan las kyang skye mod /
translated: Even if it arises from another object,

original: de lta na yang don gzhan de des dmigs pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de lta na yang don gzhan de des dmigs pa ma yin la /
translated: in that case, that other object is not observed by it.

original: de las kyang dmigs pa gzhan la mi ltos par skye ba nyid kyi phyir zhes de mngon sum min par 'gyur /
analyzed: de las kyang dmigs pa gzhan la mi ltos par skye ba nyid kyi phyir zhes de mngon sum min par 'gyur /
translated: And it also arises without depending on another object. Therefore, it would not be perception.

original: 'o na gal te yul gang gis shes pa gang tha snyad bya ba de las 'gyur na yin gyi mi 'gyur la ni ma yin @41a * //
analyzed: 'o na gal te yul gang gis shes pa gang tha snyad bya ba de las 'gyur na yin gyi mi 'gyur la ni ma yin @41a * //
translated: If the object by which a cognition is designated arises from that, it would not arise from what is not that.

original: no zhes pa'i nges pa 'di yang 'dir mngon par 'dod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: no zhes pa'i nges pa 'di yang 'dir mngon par 'dod pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is this certainty that is stated not also accepted here?

original: dran pa la sogs pa rnams ni dmigs pa gang gis tha snyad byed pa de las skye ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dran pa la sogs pa rnams ni dmigs pa gang gis tha snyad byed pa de las skye ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor do mindfulness and so on arise from the object that is the basis of their designation.
